‚Ä¢ Content is tailored to every player‚Äôs strengths and weaknesses
‚Ä¢ Math questions are fully aligned with state-level curricula, including Common Core and TEKS, so Prodigy is always connected to the classroom.
‚Ä¢ 1,400 available skills give students the chance to learn more and keep growing.

For a full list of the skills Prodigy supports, visit prodigygame.com/math/skills.

Are you a parent? Connect a free parent account today to:

‚Ä¢See what math practice your child is working on
‚Ä¢Monitor your child‚Äôs understanding and progress
‚Ä¢Set goals and give reward to encourage even more math practice!

To sign up for your free parent account, visit prodigygame.com.

>>Want your child to learn more?<<

You can use Prodigy to turn playtime into education time. Premium members level up faster, spend more time answering math questions and get exclusive access to pets, member-only game areas and extra rewards. To sign up today, visit prodigygame.com/membership.

To learn more about Prodigy and to get started, visit www.prodigygame.com.

One of the American Association of School Librarians‚Äô Best Websites for Teaching and Learning 2018
A 2018 Top Pick for Learning from Common Sense Education
iKeepSafe FERPA Certification
iKeepSafe COPPA Safe Harbor Certification
summary: Epic battles, interactive quests and exotic pets. Learn math with Prodigy today!

scraped_reviews.content: I would have given it 5 stars if I had written a review 2 years ago, but Prodigy Math has become frustrating. They keep adding new stuff that doesn't get anywhere with the storyline, which was really interesting at first. Not being able to level up lower evolution pets is a bummer. The new currency is annoying; it's rare, but almost all the good stuff is pricey. Plus, constant updates make it hard to keep track of how things work. Some things are more complicated than before and miss how it was

I have always loved Prodigy and I still do. I have been playing it since elementary and I am currently in high school. As good as the game is, I miss the way it used to look. The pixelated texture gave it a nice old feel that had even managed to attracted older audiences. I would find it nice if in a future update, people can decide to either use the new Prodigy designs, the old designs, and maybe even the oldest designs. (Players can switch between them, keeping current progress).

I used to love this game, it was awesome... until they changed the way the combat worked and removed the pixel style. before, you didn't have to use your pets if you ran out of energy. It's super annoying knowing how much better it was. Even if this seems trivial, the pixel style being removed was a travesty. It's a good game though just not as good anymore

Great game as a kid who has been playing for around 7 years I would definitely recommend. HOWEVER since I have gotten older my got rid of the membership and HALF AND I MEAN HALF of the game is not there, some of my member items I can't even use anymore,you have to fix the pay to win of this ok . don't get me wrong it's a fantastic game but you really have to be more for the education like you were back in the day ok? a membership used to get you more gold not the rest of the game. you got this(;

Okay, I used to really like this game; it had simple controls, fun ways to study math and English, everything an educational game needed. But the new update with the new character design is really awful. Compared to the old design, the new character just looks so lifeless and boring. To add onto it, the controls became more difficult to figure out. It also seems way more pay-to-play then before, with promotions of the membership everywhere.

I really love Prodigy, I really do! But, I just HATE the fact that we have to be a member to evolve pets, and climb the Dark Tower. Also, can you at least make the rescue pet option for free after wasting other pets on it? It's annoying, and unfair. I play this at school sometimes, and other classmates can agree, some of them even quit because mostly everything needs membership. I understand you need to make money, but, if you want to have more people playing your game, make it fun and free!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, 
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: This was fun, but the art changed and the game lost its unique and fun game feeling, it just felt like a cheap update to roll in interest. Some of the game mechanics also changed in a way that didn't make sense. I liked how cool the pets I collected were, and now they all have these cute expressions on, if they are targeting this for 9-12, I feel like there shouldn't be a need to make it baby game-coded. Even the app still keeps the pixel art style, I wish you could just pick a mode to play on.

I played prodigy since I was in 4th grade and it was the best thing ever. Overtime, there was a few updates like the layout of the game but it was still fun nevertheless. Then an update happened that made me hate prodigy forever. Battles, completely different! Spells/gear, completely different! And the worst of all, I can't evolve my pets without paying for the membership! The membership is way too pricey for all of that! I wish prodigy would go back to the way it was when it first came out.

I enjoy this game and think it has the ability to be a great tool for children to learn in a fun manner. The reason for 3 stars is for two reasons: 1. The game crashes on my phone, regularly. It's a newer phone with gear connection. Others have this issue, so the designers need to fix this, especially if they are going to hound us for money. 2. The constant reminder for membership. I don't mind that you want to pay the employees. That makes sense, but it's all very excessive. Aide from every other move telling you how gear being a member is, there are FAR too many perks to be a member. So much content is locked otherwise. I have gear I can't wear, a lot I can't do. For a learning game I think it's a pretty cheap shot to have it a Pay-To-Win game. It's designed for children. I'm assuming most don't have 5 a month. Fix the connectivity and revamp and calm down the member system, and this app would be 5 stars.

Beautiful job. I love it. I was struggling with math concepts recently ( I still am lol) but prodigy helped with some of that. I like that you cab evolve pets but sadly I am broke and can't afford the membership. The only complaint I have is not being able to ever evolve pets, like ever. Willbyou please add some kind of quest that a wandering merchant will give you ti earn them, or some way to build them with coins, so the players don't have to spend money.

I really love Prodigy, and I have been playing for about 2 years now. And if you developers could add the old pets back from like 2 years ago that would be great. I am level 100, have climbed all the way up the dark tower to floor 100, and the only thing I know is you can only find the outdated pets is in the dark tower but you can't even tame them. I would also like them to add the starter-academy pets. So you can find them on different islands and stuff. I am hoping for you to add this stuff.

Love this app sooo much!!Ahhh, I can't stop playing it! But, I have a few requests! Ignore if you want lol Chat. The chat system is a great way to make friends, but we are VERY limited!! Could we have more chats available, or something like the chat system in Animal Jam:Play Wild!, which blocks certain words, sentences, and other bad things. I sometimes have questions that I want to ask my fellow wizards, and this would brighten our day!! Trading. Ive been thinking about this for awhile. What if we had trade, where we could trade for a wand, hat, buddy, or something else? Maybe even opening our own little store in our profile!! I really want the Cat Ears from the Membership November box, but I can't offer anything for it. I think trading would be a great way to earn currency or certain items. Problems with Membership items. I have a couple membership items in my inventory, but can't use them. I feel we should be able to use these even when we don't HAVE membership, but they're legit floating around in there. I also think that some items that are membership-only are TOO MUCH!! Maybe for some items, it costs less for Members, but the full price for us non-members! I'd LOVE to have the calico kitty padding around behind me! Thanks for your time! Have a fantastic day!

Prodigy used to be so fun. Now it's just looking for money. Every battle, I'm sad that I can't evolve my lets without the game telling me I have to pay for it. The battle system isn't what it used to be either. Growing up in 2015, I saw the game as a really cool learning app, and the graphics weren't terrible. It had good dialauge too, now it's just them asking me to pay for their app when they could just make you pay for it to buy the game or something instead of a membership for the full exp

Great app for math! It's so fun and cool. At first, I thought Prodigy was just one of those math apps with a lot of commercials and it was no fun whatsoever. But oh boy was I wrong! I love the arcade like-style and graphics! I also love Noot, he's super cute! Don't get me started on the character customization! I absolutely LOVE it! While you can't change the outfit, you can change the hair, hair color, eye color and skin color! Overall it's a great, underrated, math game!

I really like this game. Everything is appealing, the game is challenging and fun, and the custom character creation is great! However, there's a major problem with this game now. That problem is the fact you can't experience 70% of the game without premium. For example, to buy Medium or better houses, rescue more pets or even evolve them, you must pay a monthly fee. Please, JUST PLEASE CHANGE THS! #MakeProdigyGreatAgain

It is a really fun and educational game that people of all ages can enjoy. The cool creatures, different spells, the type system, it is all very captivating elements of the game. The only thing wrong is the membership. You cant climb the tower, you can't evolve pets, and after you get eight pets, you can't catch anymore. It makes it very frustrating. I have my main pets evolved only because I was part of the game back when you could evolve pets and have several in your party. Please fix this.

Its good, but it is not the best it could be. There should be ways to have free membership. If I'm battling a member at even a lower level they beat me by a lot. I feel that member stars shouldn't be a thing and that a lot more items and evolving available for everyone . The multiple currencies is very confusing. Could there be currency exchanges? The arena is confusing and the top 10,000 should get the pets. Beyond that its a game that I never get bored at. There's always something going on!

Listen, I LOVE prodigy so much, but... you have to have membership to do everything! I Mean, you can't even evolve your pets unless you have membership!!! Plus, the amount of membership ads is overwhelming. I used to love this game, but now membership is involved with everything. It's gotten to the point where I deleted the app on my phone and stopped playing the game on my computer. This membership stuff has made the game really unfun and unfair to me and many others. Please fix it.

Really cool game! It makes learning a little more fun. My son, who's in another state, and I play together and do "battles" together. And even at 34, I've actually improved at math since playing with him lol. You forget a lot after 22 years! My only criticism is it's too easy to avoid doing math problems by using the game more as a social media type thing, or play around with other people on thr game. Simpler math problems should pop up every 5 minutes IMO.

This is a good math game, the best I have played so far. You can create your own character, battle monsters, catch them and best of all MATH!! To some kids this may not sound fun but once you get used to it, it will be fun. The math your parents will like it. Prodigy, PLEASE make more items in the game for non-members. 2 of my pets can evolve but I can't evolve them. Please do this. And about the epics once you chose an epic you can't get another one. Please make a trading and giving system. Bye

It so fun! I used to hate the thought of math, so I failed. Then when our teacher introduced us to this I started to like math. This makes learning math fun. All the items you can earn, and the pets/companions you can earn. I especially love that your companions can evolve. My Rickrack is taking forever to evolve though. Sometimes I feel like it's not gonna evolve into the Flyger. Is there a reason for that?

Okay, so graphics and gameplay are okay. But the thing is in ShiverChill Mountains(?) I wanted to buy Frostfang, but then it said become a member although it didn't have a member tag?? Also, I really can't find frostfang anywhere. But otherwise the app is okay. Also, the game is pretty boring when you completed every land. So maybe for activities?? Otherwise, it's okay.

This game is super fun and educational! I'm glad that this game can make education fun for a wide range of ages, covering plenty of different categories in math. Even though this game gladly limits what children can say to each other, I sometimes wish that I can ask other things like "Where did you get that from?". Even though I like how they are making sure that children can't give away to much personal info, it limits to much.

It used to be fun, but afterwards it just became plain and boring. First off, I loved evolving my pets and it was lots of hard work. When I was able to evolve my pet, I had to pay for stupid membership. Second, in chests I win awesome items. However, once the updates rolled in, I wasn't able to use as many as I was able to. I deleted this game. If we end up having to pay to play, it will just be a big rip off considering this game is perfect for math. Please make the game how it used to be.

Although the game is fun because you can collect items, make friends, battle other people, and own a house, it is really agitating when I am doing the dark tower. The game crashes when I am in the middle of battling. In order for the dark tower to save where you are, you must be on a level that ends with '1' or '6'. And when you crash, you have to start at the previous saved level. I find this really inconvenient because I only have membership for a few days and I want to reach level 100.

This is an actually fun, good-quality, educational game -my fav. There are only four issues; you have to pay for the full experience (thankfully, no ads), there are too many hackers, the battle setup sucks, and the graphics have been getting worse lately. The animations used to want to make me play the game again. Now it appears too soft and round, ruining the design. It looks like something for a smaller child than the target audience- it is a game for all ages. Please bring back 2020 graphics!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great game and my kids both love it, however they are frustrated by the insane amount of in-game advertising and the fact that quite a bit of game content is locked behind paid membership. I love the learning algorithm the game runs on, and it is effective. However, it is painful to watch my kids being frustrated that they cannot collect all the pets or evolve the pets they have. I would have gladly given 5 stars if membership was cosmetic and not actual game content.

I've played this game for a long time. And there is just this one thing that I would like to put out. And it's all the membership! You literally can't have or do anything without membership. Even with the buddies I really wanted some of the buddies in the pet store but you can't get any of them about membership you can only get the hamster. Or climbing the rest of the tower. Or getting the epic pets too! Or rescuing pets either. I was hoping you would change that at some point.

The game is good. I think you should change some stuff though. Like evolving your pets. It's pretty annoying when you don't have membership to evolve them, so they can become stronger. It's like a pay to win game. You buy membership then you get access to more powerful items. But if you don't, your weaker than everybody else. Please make some stuff not membership needed. It would probably make everyone day better.

I love this game. It turns learning math to a whole different level with challenges and many more things. I am a member and it has changed the way I look at math. There is one thing though. I would love it if you could add a food shop. I ask this because when I need food it some times takes about a month to get one piece. I was just wondering if you could add it to prodigy. Maybe in lamplight town like the potion shop. But all in all this game is amazing.

This game used to be amazing, but now it's just a cringy piece of pay to play. Noot changed from a cute little fairy to something in your nightmares. You can't even mind your own business without being mobbed by a bunch of prodigy membership ads. The character design is fine, but I miss the way it was pixelated. Oh and im sure that treasure track is a knockoff of wilcraft's wild pass. I would recommend playing, but at the same time, I wouldn't.

Great game! I play this at school, and was so happy I could play it at home! No lag, great graphics, and its just amazing! It makes learning math fun! I hate math, but this game keeps me learning! Although, can you please make membership free? Like, if you get to lvl 100 you get it? Cuz it feels like almost half of the items, houses, pets, are all locked to me due to membership. Thank you for reading! Download this game! Trust me, its amazing.

Great and not. My kids have a lot of fun with this! However my sons game constantly crashes which is very frustrating so he has to start missions over. The reminder of not having a membership is crazy. No upgrading or evolving without it sadly. I would love to have a membership but it would be over a hundred bucks for my two kids. I thought there was a pay by month but they wanted it all upfront. Thats just not doable for us. Fix the crashing and constant not a member reminder and its great.

This program is wonderful, it helps engage children in an educational way and with fun. Though, I understand the memberships are what funds this whole thing, but it would be nice if when I took every 3 steps a membership purchase ad doesn't come up. Also, parental login is very confusing, I don't even know how to start. You might want to look into the links. Otherwise, love what you did with it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback - we'll pass that along!

scraped_reviews.content: Absolute game changer. I fully recommend this game. My kids are obsessed and they don't even know how much they are learning. The school introduced it to them. They asked to play at home too and I was so impressed that I bought memberships. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is due to the pet menu, you can't let go of more than one pet at a time and the list scrolls all the way back to the top everytime you delete one which becomes VERY time consuming. Plus a few small minor things.

I really like it. This app in a nuthsell: Educational, but also a very fun way to learn math. Now, I'm not sure if THIS was the game's fault or not, but at a point it wouldn't let me get any more pets. If this was a bug, having no Membership or simply the app's restriction to the amount of pets you can have, I don't know. But it kind of upset me, and if it was a glitch, please fix it. If not, that's fine, but if it wasn't a bug please consider letting us have unlimited pets.

I love this game. It's fun and educational. The storyline is neat too! But I think you've gone a bit too far with the membership. It seems as if you need the membership to do almost ANYTHING. And I think it would be better as a one purchase the and NOT a trial. But I do have one question, are there ANY differences between downloading the game and just playing it in the internet? Kind of a waste of storage if you ask me. Other than the membership, the game is pretty good.

This was the breakthrough for my Asperger's daughter who absolutely loathes worksheets and set curricula. You do have to get a membership to unlock all the perks and critter evolutions and items (you can play quite a ways without, we found), but for us, if it gets her to willingly practice math skills and is fun, it's well worth the price!

This is one of my favorite games ever, been playing it since 1st grade, and I must say, the new updates are pretty good, but I do have a few problems. To start off, why can't we evolve pets?, I don't really get why we would charge for that. Secondly, why can't we have more than 10 pets?! 10!!, I could get it if it was 20, but 10? Really? Next is rescuing evolved pets. Why do that? And the dark tower, just make it free.i love this game, but if we made those things free, it'd be a perfect mathgame

I love prodigy I use to play it more often, but I have one major complaint and it seems a lot of people do too. The membership sucks, you can't do anything anymore because of membership. Yes I know prodigy is just trying to keep the app running, but it's like you want to evolve your pets, nah pay a monthly fee for that. Also the pet limitations went up. So now no one can really have that much of a team. Oh yes it's only k-8 please if you can make it k-12.

I love the game. The only problem I have is the bounty board. It keeps putting monsters in really hard places to find. Also, could you bring back the lost island. I am level 100 and would really like to see it. I would also love to see shivertusk. It makes it so that nonmembers can find it but not catch it, but members can catch it, but not find it. Please fix this and I will raise my rate.

This game used to be phenomenal. When I found out about it at school I started playing it at home as well, but then after some update they decided to lock everything behind a membership that is way too expensive. Like you have to pay to evolve pets now?!?! It's honestly so stupid. Don't bother playing this game anymore, it claims to be free but all the core features are locked behind a paywall. PLEASE ACTUALLY MAKE THE GAME FREE AGAIN.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! Memberships help ensure Prodigy stays free in schools, and also keeps all of our educational content available at no cost at all. We appreciate your feedback on our membership features, and will pass along to our product development team.

scraped_reviews.content: Ok first of all, the pixelated character designs were really charming while you had them, sadly there's a new art style that looks alright compared to the past one, second, why do you need membership to use certain gear, catch and evolve pets, and etcetera, it's really frustrating seeing my child beg me for membership, please make membership less expensive for parents like me.

For an app that is required by their teachers, my kids adore this program. It makes learning math fun! Combining customizable characters with adventure, battles with monsters and the ability to play online with classmates, it's an absolutely perfect way to get your grade-schooler to WANT to learn math. The problems are appropriate to grade level while also throwing in some easy ones to keep their minds sharp (and remind them of how much they've learned). It's a math game they ask to play!

The game is awesome so and so, but the fact that most of the game it kept away in the membership that cost 70$?!?!?! It was a fun game and it wasn't so expensive before, and before I got a question on my school computer, I couldn't even answer it because I needed to use the √ó and √∑ keys, you gotta fix that, but the fact you can't evolve, catch evolved creatures, get better houses, or even go in the pet shop is stupid! You don't care about children you just want money! Stop this scamming!

I love prodigy, it's a fun alternative for the math games teachers make us play. All the people who claim the are getting it right and prodigy is telling them it's wrong are just mad at the membership and trying to make it seem its the worst game ever. They explain everything well, and it has helped get ahead in school, and Im in pre-Ap (proves how ahead it gets you, more ahead the the most ahead class) I do agree that the membership could be cheaper, but other than that, it's a fantactic game!

I found an advertisement for this game and it looked like an awesome option for my kindergartener. The difficulty starts at first grade so I had my worries that it might be tough for her but from what I can tell it does a great job at gauging their abilities. It starts super easy and seems to get a little harder if she's getting a lot of questions in a category correct. I started playing too to help encourage her to play, and honestly it's a lot of fun. it's kinda like pokemon but different!

Game used to be fun and educational, now it's about arrogant game devs making money. To do almost anything fun, you have to do a math problem, which gets annoying. You have to buy an expensive membership to progress very much. There's a balance you have to reach between math, and just having fun, for it to be a math game, in my opinion this has way too much math, they may as well take out the game portions of it, and call it a free math test. The game is also really stupid and pointless.

I love Prodigy, it is both fun and challenging! I love Prodigy but I give it a 3-star review because of the membership. The membership aggravates me because the whole game is pretty much based around the membership, sure you can play without the membership but it's pretty depressing because pretty much all the pets you can get you have to get the membership there's only like 5 pets that you can get without the membership. It's also not letting me get into the game no matter what I do!!!!

Decent game. Would recomend 7-14. Lots of things you can get to dress up your wizard/sorceress. Theres also dancing and a chat box though its extreamly limited to the game content and optimistic phrases which is a little annoying at times. But a lot of things are limited to memebers-only, please loosen the options for non-members a little bit! Sometimes the questions are worded weirdly. Overall, great game! Prodigy makes learning math fun!

summary: Our Chase Mobile App makes it easy for you to bank on the go 24/7.

scraped_reviews.content: You can set up a recurring payment but there is no where to manage it. guess what? it will keep going forever and you will keep losing money. The help information on the app is totally out dated and showing misleading information. The digital assistant is also a huge waste of time. I finally figured out how to do that on the website and that further proves that THIS APP IS A FAILURE.

I am EXTREMELY disappointed with Chase. I have had perfect payments with them for a long time. I have a FICO score of 800. The 1 time I am late by 1 day and they penalized me $36‚Å∞‚Å∞. I will pay the rest of my credit card off and will not use it again. I used my card a lot. I hope the extra $36‚Å∞‚Å∞ was worth it Chase. You lost out on a lot of extra revenue from me.

Really frustrating because it works sometimes and other times it doesn't. My other finance apps open no problem this one is hit or miss. RIDICULOUS!! 6 years later and now the issue is "can't find username or password" have to uninstall then reinstall to get in. once in when I click on my account I get "error loading try again" close it out reopen app repeat cycle. I'll switch banks yall want to keep playing.

Won't save my biometrics information! I've tried absolutely everything and even after successfully setting it up, it immediately reverts to it being disabled. I've tried doing it immediately upon login, through the settings menu inside the app, and saving the biometrics key it to my Google account, but absolutely nothing works. This only started happening a couple weeks ago or so. But now every time I log in (with my password mind you) I'm met with the same message about Setting up Biometricsü§¨

UPDATE: 7 years later, still the same issues! On top of that, the *required* update led to "Your account doesn't exist." issue, so can't even login! Absolute amateurs. As usual, Chase continues with it's dictatorship, one-way street approach to providing services 1. Updates should be optional. If you can't create back compatible products, get another job. 2. If the app is installed in external storage, it should be updated there! If you hard code internal locations for updates, get another job.

used to be a 5 star app, now Zelle does not work. I know exactly why, there is a bug that I've identified, but after attempting to send a bug report by email, and in the digital assistant chat, and even with the secure email inside the app, I see the user (me) is just sent in endless loops of menus to keep us talking to machines instead of a human with a brain.

You know what's nice? Security. You know what's not nice? So much security that it's a massive inconvenience. The app always logs me off and never remembers my password. I use a password manager so I KNOW the password is always correct, but I always get an error and have to change it. Every. Time. I. Use. The. App. And the text to receive the password isn't a standard 6 digit code - it's an 8 digit code that you can't even paste into the app. Absolute garbage app that isn't even worth the hassle

Incredibly annoying! Can't do most things via the app and am forced to call in. Calling in is the worst. It always takes so long to do anything, no matter what it is. Customer service reps always end up telling me I can do things on the app. No I can't. Right now for example. I need to dispute a transaction and it's prompting me to once again call in. WHAT IS THE POINT SAYING YOU CAN DO IT WITHIN THE APP IF THE APP TELLS YOU TO CALL IN?!

Used to be ok. Now chase travel just straight up doesn't work on the app. Every time you try to click on book a hotel or flight nothing happens or loads. Have tried clearing the cache. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Weird for such a major operation to have an app that just doesn't work at all. Hopefully they figure it out eventually

I hate to give this app less than 5 stars because I honestly love it, but please go back to how you used to display pending charges. Ever since Chase started including pending payments along with pending charges it is nearly impossible to calculate an accurate balance. It was so much easier to figure out pending charges before this change was made to the app.

This is an update, I was very happy with the previous two versions, forcing me to update in order to gain access to my account info is just wrong. Being able to monitor multiple accounts, make transfers and payments are very easy. Being told the app is not secure? With all the required permissions it's no wonder. Why exclude Android 6, update the damn app.

Ok, as a company, Chase is not a bank for the little guy. It's hard to get your money, hard to deposit a paycheck unless you get off work at 4pm, limited hours, poor credit rates, etc.. But, this app is actually pretty decent. The lock my card feature works well and unlocks immediately when prompted to. The notifications are very poor, only sometimes notifies me of my set amounts or deposits, withdrawals notify fast, but this may be an android issue...

This is the worst app I've ever had the displeasure of using. If you mess up your password once, you must jump through flaming hoops to make another one. Sometimes it even fails to recognize if you put it in correctly. I can't even change my damn address because it keeps saying that part of the site "doesn't seem to be working right now", or ever. Chase is the worst. I'm considering changing banks because this app is so abysmal.

I'm not sure what is going on with the application. I have been trying to download it for 4 days & it keeps saying pending. What I do know is they perform too much updates!!! Once a month is fine but they do it at least 3x a month. Very unnecessary! I uninstalled the app because I wasn't able to access my account with updating it. Now I am not able to reinstall & it's driving me insane. I check my account on a daily basis. And I love the convenience of not going to the bank. Please fix it.

I love Chase, and had my very first hank account and credit card with them. However, there is this odd issue happening with credit cards in the app for about a year now. Sometimes when I make a large payment, it shows right away and I have access to the money. Then, the next day my available balance is completely wrong for 24 hours. Not sure why this happens. It goes back to normal the second day after making the payment, but it's annoying to have the incorrect amount show for a day.

It requires you to sign in rather than use your biometrics if you don't use the app within a short period of time. I mean what is more secure than your biometrics!? Update: if you have a credit, there is no option to have the funds transferred back into your account. Your only options are spending the credit on the card or actually calling to have a check sent in 7-10 biz days. What is this 1985? They can take your money so quickly, but when they have YOUR money they make it hard to get it.

It used to be great. Now, I can no longer get to secure messages. It's just a blank screen with a continuously rotating blue circle. Also, I can no longer schedule credit card payments for future dates. I contacted support, and their instructions don't match anything on the screen. They just told me to uninstall and reinstall. Updates are terrible.

After last update, I can't turn back on fingerprint access. It says "We are temporarily unable to connect with Chase. Please try again later." Tried on both wifi and cellular without any difference. Apparently "temporarily" means weeks not hours. It makes a lackluster app that gets in the way more than it helps that much worse when I can't easily access my accounts. If you're looking for a bank and considering Chase, keep looking. The poor digital experience is universal across platforms.

This was a fine app, worked well for a while. Not it's pretty much useless because it doesn't work... I can't sign in. A week ago it was working fine. Now it just loads forever and then sends a message that it's unable to connect. Kinda difficult to do anything with my account when the app won't load at all. Tried Uninstalling and reinstalling but no luck. Tl:Dr: I updated the review to 1 star, I'd go lower but I can't because the app does work at all for me.

Chase turned off my autopayments; I check everyday to make sure the automatic payments for credit card was turned on. It has been on since I got the credit card. Tried to use it today and was unable to due to bill not being paid. Checked automatic payments and it was turned off. I did not turn them off. Now my bill has extra late fees and my credit score has been negatively affected. Thanks Chase.

Like a few others have posted here, the app crashes on every attempt to login. I upgraded to Android 10 last month, and ever since then I can't login to the app. I have uninstalled and reinstalled more than 10 times over the last month, and it still won't work. I've sent over 50 app crash reports. Reached out to support, but get no help. FIX YOUR APP CHASE!!!

This app has not been working properly. It literally just won't work. Gives an error message for months now. I have tried uninstalling/re-installing. Customer service has lied each time I've tried them by saying they're aware of the problem, that it just started a few days prior, and will resolve it soon. It's been several months; it is not resolved. And I believe because of this my incoming belle's won't work.

There password requirements and amount of times that you have to reset your password are ridiculous. Also, the fingerprint sign in option hasn't worked in months. I understand the need for security, but one shouldn't have to reset their password nearly every time they open their app. None of the other banking apps I've used make signing in this difficult. other than trying to get into the app, the experience is fine. allows you to do want you need to, nothing more.

New update made the app unstable. I can't scroll down on some pages & it will not allow me to pay my credit card through the app. Not great. They added the ability to add a receipt picture to each purchase, but my concern would be that they may use that information to sell to other companies, similar to Ibotta. Please just make a simple app that works & have add-ons for further functionality, like account spending categories & receipt pictures. And please just FIX IT! Thanks :)

My primary reasons for using this app are checking my account balance and transferring money to and from savings as needed. For that, I find this app incredibly useful, and easy to use. I also like the notifications if my balance is low. My ONLY complaint is that it is currently using one full gig of data on my phone, and there is no option to save this app to an external memory card. Something that takes up that much memory should be able to be saved to a memory card. But, I won't delete it because I use it too often!

App was perfect before the change in December. Now it's a pain to access transaction activity as others have said. My biggest issue, however, is that it is constantly running (+ crashing) and adding multiple "file map" files DAILY to my internal storage (of which I do not have a lot). They now total more space than the app itself. Prior to the December update, I didn't have this issue. I do not have $$ for a newer phone to accommodate this memory hog. Disappointed. Fix or explain.

Be careful when using the select your bank option to pay your credit cards. While the app initially gave me the impression that my bank was set up correctly by showing all the correct balances in my account, it failed to pull the correct account numbers. As a result, my payments did not go through. To make matters worse, there were no notifications or alerts indicating that the payments had failed. If a feature does not work or has not been tested for a spedific bank, it should not exist.

The first time I deposited a check, it went through with zero problems. Now, when trying to deposit a check, after entering the amount, the, "Next", button stays greyed out and wont allow me to advance to the next page. I live 30 mins, minimum, away from the nearest Chase branch, so this is big issue and will probably force me to change banks, if not sorted.

The app is easy to use, and I love all of the tracking info it gives you, but trying to log In is a nightmare. For starters, the "remember me" button has NEVER worked, which I'm assuming is a client-side issue. Also, I've had to jump through hoops to change my password EVERY TIME I try to log in to the app. For whatever reason, the app never remembers my password, and I have list of a dozen or so passwords that have only worked one time after I reset them. Good app, but it's me-proof.

Use to love this app, but for the past few months it won't let me log in. It either says "unable to connect to chase at the moment" or "we do not recognize that username or password". I've uninstalled and reinstalled, still no luck. If I go online on my laptop or desktop, I can log on, but the app won't work. I see lots of other reviews with the same issue. If Chase fixes the issue, I will change my raiting.

Every mandatory update creates more frustration. I have two accounts with them so when I changed the username to type in my other one the app wants to delete the previous one. I don't see an option to save the username. The app caused me to logout and lock my account. I called to reset and get a verification code. Some autocall was going to give me a verification code instead of just sending a text. The system didn't give me more than 20 seconds to find a pen before it hung up on me.

I've had issues logging in on a couple occasions, which has prevented me from making on time payments! My other Card providers, 4 example, Say my payment due dates the 1st of each month, There is a grace period on making the on-time payment, which is 5 days after the due date, then you are late definitively! You're not charged a late fee until after that time frame is up! I feel if you cannot get logged into the way that you make your payments, that is not The fault of a customer having issues!

I direct deposit the qualified amount every month for free checking, but Chase still makes you track your own transactions and forces you to keep a paper ledger! I'll tell you why ... I've a Chase bank account for over 7 years. I've had very few problems but there is one GIANT problem that they seem to never fix. In the app, you can have dozens of pending charges for several days such as up to a week! These are simple purchases from say Walmart. Of course the pending amount is supposed to be included in the calculation of currentl available balance, but it's definitely not. This issue has cost us hundreds in insufficient funds fees because the app will show that you have say $500 available balance while displaying the pending charges in the order they were charged. So using the debit card we would go buy fuel and other purchases within the $500 balance, the next day we would be overdrawn. Why? We'll come to find out after speaking to a banker and showing him screenshots of the ledger shown on the app, his ledger on the chase computer is totally different. He had different transaction dates and order, he had more pending charges than what I was shown on the app, and his displayed the ONLINE TRANSACTIONS. That was the kicker, chase will allow you to spend money with the debit card even though your account is negative if you have pending online transactions and they will display a positive balance on the app, thus allowing you to overspend your budget and ultimately pay insufficient funds fees of $34 per transaction. This happened not once, but 11 times before we switched to a different bank account. The new bank's app does not opperate this way.

Well first of all, I really liked banking with Chase. But now i don't know what to think of this bank. They really didn't bother me at all with anything and I would seldom get alerts, but now i got an issue with them. My account was recently closed due to restrictions on my card, was never given an alert, call or email on this. Neither was i given an explanation of why my card was restricted from using. I've never did anything wrong, all my transaction were good and nothing was wrong.

I have great credit score, multiple credit cards with them (4), and a checking account - not enough to prevent them from closing one of my accounts bc I hadn't used that card in a year (card hadn't been working so I ordered a replacement for it). I find that pretty ridiculous so I just opened a Citi credit card and checking account and will eventually be transitioning over to them. Highly recommend understanding your client's total credit/banking picture with you before doing something dumb AF.

Not a good company. They cut my limit on one of my cards in half and less than half on another because of balances on other cards. It doesn't matter that my payment history is exceptional and I have no late or missed payments. Total b.s! That's only going to further impact my score and may have a negative impact with other companies. As soon as I pay them off, I'm canceling all 3 cards. They'll never make another dimensions off me!!!

Unable to log in. It required password, text contact, biometric registration, and scanning one's driver's license, which is ridiculous since that's more than you'd need to launch a nuclear missile. It won't scan my driver's license after carefully composing the picture as requested, holding the phone as still as a sniper, and adjusting lighting for glare. I wasted nearly an hour trying to log in, then gave up. At this point I'd rather cancel my Chase account than jump through any more hoops.

While it's better than other banking apps I've used, it's still fairly tricky to navigate the menu system and know where things are. Also, I regularly use Zelle and today it just stopped working. I can't send funds, the screen is blank. Restarting the app or my phone doesn't fix it. And recently I've had other issues with the Zelle integration not letting me edit contacts. It's just a poor setup, they need better designers.

Why can't you just put all my accounts on the first page, so I can see everything, the account preview thing never works. i hate having to click on 20 things just to see my balance of my primary account, then another 20 to pay my credit card. Just put in on one page. or give me the option to setup how I want it to look when I sign in on the mobile app!!!!

There is no search. You can't escape out of the menu pop-up. There are 2 menus and it's illogical what's on each. No menu item leads me to be able to temporarily suspend my card. Even if you're closed, there should be a way to report potential fraud. I received a text telling me my card was suspended due to suspicious activity to go to a link on the text. I suspect this text may be fraudulent, and i feel verifying in a timely manner to be of the utmost importance. But there is no way to do this.

For the past 3 months I can not login into the app. I get a message saying "we are unable to log into your account as we are experiencing technical difficulties and we are working quickly to resolve these issues." I run a business and use the mobile deposit all the time for checks because it's convenient and I dont get to the bank much. Very disappointed, I have uninstalled and reinstalled app and it still doesn't work.

Not everyone is rich and can afford the latest versions of phones! All I want to do is quickly check my bank account and any recent charges made. I don't need all these extra add-ons and now there telling me that the app is no longer support on this device. So I can't even use the app anymore. I'll have to go back to primeval times where I'll have to call the card and find out my last 5 transactions. Thanks chase bank for making it convenient for your lower income customers.

They like to rearrange your payments, charge unnecessary fees, and have recently started taking more than a week to deposit checks. And when my credit card overcharged my intentionally small limit, they informed the credit bureaus the same day and I didn't find out until later. Dropped my credit score 38 points. You have to PAY for them to decline a charge that goes over limit. The AI chat option is next to useless. If this wasn't standard at every US bank, I would leave.

For the most part Chase has been wonderful. You do have to keep an eye on your account regularly. They will occasionally charge a monthly fee when you have automatic deposits going into your accounts. Just call and have them fix it. They do handle fraudulent charges really well. They can also give you a number for filing a police report if needed. For the most part, I have had a better experience with Chase than other banks.

One of the apps I always have on my phone. Very helpful, rarely crashes, secure and easy to use! I like the preview option to check things in a pinch! It does tend to load slowly and often doesn't trigger the keyboard/keypad when I go to make a payment or add a memo. I primarily use it to check account balances; otherwise, I go to the site on my computer.

I never have to go to the bank anymore! I can deposit checks right thru the app, I can pay other cards, I can shop, I can make money transfers between accounts, even withdrawals are easy! UPDATE: if you attempt to use app to go back and forth to research transactions, even when you have not logged off, it will semi-lock on you! It will only allow you to go between accounts a few times and then lock you out. This is an extreme inconvenience.

Overall, I like the app. They fixed the drop down menu. It now has several options related to your personal profile in addition to the logout. It is a bit clunky still, with an absence of intuitive shortcuts, but it is not difficult to figure out how to get where you need to go. I really like the check deposit feature. Within the app you take a pic of both sides of your signed check and they deposit it! Super handy (Insert smiley face).

Update: a hot mess. Doesn't work on wifi, only mobile data, and logging in with fingerprints has been broken since upgrading to Oreo. The OS has been out for almost a year now. Come on, Chase, get it together. Everytime I think you're doing well you pull something like this. Was: The latest few updates have given us an app that is decent looking, fairly modern, and is only slightly annoying to use. A lot of things could be streamlined to be more efficient - but it could be worse.

95% of the time, I'm unable to read my secure letters or check on my credit score. When I click on the secure message, it gives me a blank screen. When I click to check my credit score, it gives me a clear screen (loading page) and won't allow me to go back or logout. Other than that, I can check balance, pay bills, use Zelle, and other few things.

Based on other reviews, I've fortunately had pretty good luck with this app. Occasionally have trouble logging in but not often. Funds transfers & mobile deposits usually very prompt, as well as automatic deposits. One annoying thing- after viewing notifications, they don't clear- can't tell what I've seen & what I haven't, so I just ignore them all now. Also, it would be nice to be able to make notes on purchases- when you have 20 Amazon purchases in a row, identifying them would be helpful!

title: Manga Renta
description:
Read your heart away! 
With the Manga Renta app, buy and download tons of officially licensed exclusive manga straight from Japan, with new releases every day. 
Get started now and browse our collection of 7300+ titles (and counting)! 
We guarantee our abundance of manga will stimulate your senses and suit your tastes!!


What's good about Renta?
1. Professionally Translated & Officially Licensed Manga
We provide only high quality translations and all of our manga has been officially licensed. Thus, every time you purchase manga on Renta! you know you are supporting your favorite artists.

2. Easy on the Wallet
While you can always purchase our manga in order to read it indefinitely, we are the only store to also offer a 48 hour rental option. This way, you can get the best quality translations and support the authors without breaking the bank. In addition to special offers every Wednesday, we also held great deals on manga every week, so don't miss it!

3. Read Online & Offline
You can access our service from your smartphone, tablet or PC, anytime, anywhere! Download manga to your device using this app and read it offline. And don't worry, if anything happens to your device, all your manga is stored in your online bookshelf, so you can download it again anytime you want!

4. New Manga Every Day
Make sure to check back every day for new releases of officially licensed manga from popular and up-and-coming artists and authors! You can also add manga to your Wish List so we‚Äôll notify you when there is a new chapter coming out.


Customer Support
https://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/page/help/inquiry.htm
Operating Hours: Monday - Friday 9:00AM - 6:00PM (JST)

summary: Official digital-manga store. Quality translations that support artists.

scraped_reviews.content: it took a bit but i figured out how to download manga on the app after the change... you have to download directly from the browser WITHIN the app, you can't do it via an external browser anymore. the interface is still clunky and unattractive, and downloading BL is inconvenient since you can't view the title pages directly ‚Äî but honestly, i don't really care about that much as long as it works. i just wish i could switch the scroll mode so that non-webcomics can be read vertically as well.

I absolutely love this app, it's easy to use & loads quickly, plus the ability to download my favorite books is fantastic. I think the only thing I'd change is having the option to download all chapters of a book at once rather than one at a time. I did notice as of Sept. 19th, that the option to buy chapters with money instead of with points had vanished from the cart. I can still buy points to spend on them, & the option is still there on the website, but it is a little inconvenient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your input. We will continue to improve user friendliness, so please keep checking back!

scraped_reviews.content: I actually love the idea of having more Manga and supporting the artist but the pricing model is pretty poor. Why would you pay the same amount of money for a chapter when you can go and purchase a full book and read it over and over again. Sorry but I refuse to be price gouged. The model needs to be tiered with the value that you're getting and I'm just not seeing the value yet. So back to Kindle and sublime I go for now. At least there for the same price I can read it as much as I want to.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your input. We regret that we are unable to fulfill your expectation and we will continue to improve user friendliness. If you have further inquiries, please email to support@ebookrenta.com

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for a while now and it's serviceable -- I prefer reading on a tablet and it's easier for me to read that way than on my computer so I like being able to download manga to it. It's pretty bare-bones but more or less does what it needs to. Generally I make purchases from my computer then just use the app for reading chapters I've already bought and want to access offline. That said, there are a couple of things I'd love to see changed: 1) Be able to queue up multiple chapters for download instead of having to do each chapter one by one. There's a lot of going back and forth and it's really tedious if you're trying to download several full volumes. Either being able to queue up 5-6 chapters so you can get a whole book at once, or being able to bundle all the chapters of a manga into one volume and download it that way would be a big quality of life improvement. 2) Save downloaded chapters to your device's expanded storage. I read on a tablet that only has like 16gb internal storage. All the other apps I'm using that download content for offline viewing can be set to use the SD card for storage and not take up space which is nice considering how limited the internal storage is. This app doesn't seem to have this functionality so I have to delete things frequently (and considering how tedious it was to download them in the first place that's a bit frustrating).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your input. We regret that we are unable to fulfill your expectation and we will continue to improve user friendliness. If you have further inquiries, please email to support@ebookrenta.com

scraped_reviews.content: The list: -Some series never update or take forever (read: years), and there's no notification if the og serialization was cancelled -Some series are sold/rented by chapter, some by volume, some you can rent and not buy, etc. Super inconsistent, especially if you have a preference -No ePubs. Everything is kept on their site, so if they go belly up, so does your money and manga. Can't read offline. -This is a perk: occasionally gives out 100 pts for free if you spend pts semi-regularly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your input. We regret that we are unable to fulfill your expectations. You can read purchased books offline by downloading the app. If you have further inquiries, please email to support@ebookrenta.com

scraped_reviews.content: For the most part the app is fine. Its nice to be able to support artists in this way, and the ability to download books is nice, however i wish there were a way to download multiple books at once and let them download in the background. If i buy a lot of books, then its really tedious to have to go through and download them all individually, as well as having to leave the app open for the entire duration of the download

The only other downside I've found is that you need WiFi to use the app, it won't work using your data.

Renta is paradise on earth for those! good translations, lots of titles, fair previews, easy to browse, pretty easy yo pay. there's a lot to discover. the artists are suitably rewarded for their work. title: Amex Business Blueprint‚Ñ¢
description:
GET A CLEARER PICTURE OF YOUR CASH FLOW 
Designed for small business owners like you, the free American Express Business Blueprint‚Ñ¢ app offers a single location to view a current snapshot of your account balances across:
‚Ä¢	Your select American Express products.
‚Ä¢	The eligible external business checking and card accounts you‚Äôve linked to your Business Blueprint dashboard. 

GAIN INSIGHTS INTO HOW MONEY MOVES IN AND OUT OF YOUR BUSINESS    
Use easy-to-understand graphs and personalized cash flow insights about your account balances, expenses, and transactions across your select accounts to track specific details, such as: 
‚Ä¢	Changes in your cash flow ‚Äì month to month, quarter to quarter, year over year.  
‚Ä¢	Money in, money out.
‚Ä¢	Expenses ‚Äì consolidated and presented as numbers or graphs.

MAKE MORE INFORMED CASH FLOW MANAGEMENT DECISIONS      
Check your Business Blueprint app regularly to identify and anticipate patterns ‚Äì when there may be highs or lows in your cash flow ‚Äì so you can plan accordingly to keep your business moving forward.  

STREAMLINE TASKS
With your Business Blueprint app, when you apply and if you are approved for the individual financial products represented, you can also take loans, transfer money, and pay vendors, depending on which American Express products you have.         

UNLOCK THE POWER OF BUSINESS BLUEPRINT
As you plan for future highs and lows in your cash flow, use the Business Blueprint app to explore and apply for individual products that, if you are approved, can help provide continued support as you grow your business, such as:    

‚Ä¢	American Express¬Æ Business Line of Credit***
Flexible access to business financing: use what you need when you need it and only pay loan fees on what you use.

‚Ä¢	American Express¬Æ Business Checking
The digital business checking account with no monthly maintenance fees, 24/7 support, and the ability to earn Membership Rewards¬Æ points  .****


*  To see the full Terms and Conditions, copy and paste the following link into your browser and scroll to the bottom of the page: https://www.americanexpress.com/en-us/business/blueprint/  

** With the American Express Business Blueprint‚Ñ¢ App, you can view your select business products  . These products include American Express¬Æ Business Line of Credit, American Express¬Æ Business Checking, and American Express¬Æ Business Cards. Customers may also view the eligible external business checking     and card accounts they choose to link to Business Blueprint. Additional terms and limitations may apply. Some app features may only be available on supported devices. Message and data rates may apply.

*** To see the full Terms and Conditions, copy and paste the following link into your browser: https://www.americanexpress.com/en-us/business/blueprint/terms-and-conditions/business-line-of-credit/  

**** To see the full Terms and Conditions, copy and paste the following link into your browser: https://www.americanexpress.com/en-us/banking/business/checking-account/agreement/rates-and-fees/  

Deposit accounts offered by American Express National Bank. Member FDIC.

To log in, users must have an existing American Express user ID and password or create one. All access to and use of this app is subject to and governed by the American Express Privacy Statement, American Express Business Blueprint‚Ñ¢ App End User License Agreement, and American Express Terms of Service.

¬©2025 American Express. All rights reserved.

scraped_reviews.content: Not being able to use biometrics to login makes this app essentially useless. It needs you to enter the password manually and then authenticate again via a code sent to your email. It's much easier to use the web browser to login instead. Additionally, I'm still able to track all my spending on the business credit cards in the main Amex app... this app allows to track my business checking account. But, I'd rather have all tracking in one place with added functionality in the primary app!

scraped_reviews.content: The first loan application was pretty much seamless and the app was very helpful at the time. However, the app is useless now under K Servicing. After calling numerous times (and it's almost impossible to get through), sign in issues for the app have not been resolved. Also, not only is the second loan process taking much longer, but trying to change primary bank accounts has been a nightmare and still the issue had not been resolved. Disheartening.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at +18557475135. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Completely incompetent. I asked three separate times for a document on company letterhead with my routing and account #s that was needed by my credit card processor to set up deposits, each time I was told it would arrive within 2 weeks, and each time it never arrived. If they can't provide support to start banking with them, good luck getting support when you actually start banking with them.

scraped_reviews.content: A total joke of an app and bank to work with. You would think with a name like American Express basic features like a wire transfer would work, or at the very least you could call to make one like any other bank. Nope, customer service agents are worthless and you will experience so many issues. There are so many other better options, run far from this.
the App is pretty smooth, has some loading and login issues sometimes. Biggest complaint is that they don't support TOTP and rely on insecure SMS codes for Two factor Authentication. I expect better.

Requires two step login with code sent to your phone even if you're using biometrics. Who does that?? I don't have a single other banking app that does that. Very annoying. And yes I checked "remember this device" but that doesn't work. It seems like a half baked wrapper around a web interface.

This app is barely functional and noticably worse than the regular Amex app. It's super annoying I have to use a second app just to view my business checking account, when all of my personal accounts and even my business credit card can be viewed on the regular Amex app. They use SMS authentication which is a horrible security practice. The fingerprint authentication setting is supposed to skip this step, but it doesn't. Finally, the View All Transactions button only ever opens a blank screen.

This app is painfully slow and frustrating. It makes me do SMS verification every time even though I've been using the same device and I've enabled biometrics. Too many times, this app sends me to the website even though AmEx is such a big and rich company that they can easily afford the tech to make the app capable of handling everything within the app. I gave this 2 stars instead of 1 because it isn't bad at everything but it's bad enough for me to consider switching back to my old bank.

HOW IS THIS STILL SO BROKEN? It's been several months and authentication is still broken. You offer biometric authentication but your Android app will still insist on two-factor afterward. Your iOS doesn't do this and hasn't in forever. FIX THIS APP PLEEEEAAAASE before we all leave Amex and take our business elsewhere. I don't get how your personal banking app is totally functional but you've left this one to wither and die.

many of the expected functions don't work in the app. I can't expand transactions and the insights tab shows nothing and advises to connect an account. when attempting to add an account it shows as already added.
nothing works- do not open account here or close it. you can not deposit check, you can not transfer money, the stuff trys to steal your personal information. do not open an account here.
not a fan of this at all. I find it super annoying to login with a verification each time. Also I wasn't aware that we couldn't zelle with Amex Business account. thats a huge downside for me.
I really wish it were possible to chat with customer support via the app and get things resolved. Also the UI is very confusing.

Am I missing something? There are like zero ways to actually receive payments with this app? I have to get everyone to pay me with a check? Easy to send money out, but come on.... this is a business app
Always says there's a technical fault when logging in. forces me to a webpage then I have to re login and do another 2FA. App sucks
Glaringly worse than the main Amex app. Not sure why. You'd think they would have the same developers working on this but it's just not a very good app.

Interested in the interest earning checking account for my small business. Can't setup a checking account without setting up a line of credit, which I don't need. Been an AMEX customer for 40+ years but this experience may cause that to change. It's call bait and switch, way below AMEX's usual standards. May be ok for those looking for a line of credit but hardly worth the effort for a checking account.

So disappointed...this business app is garbage. It was easy getting my account initially setup, but submitting the Payment Accept application was an absolute waste of over an hour. My AMEX business account should already be included as one of the linked accounts. Am I asking for too much? So it took forever getting that setup. And then, once I finally have it linked, it has trouble connecting. Like what? This should be automatic. And no bio login? C'mon AMEX... get with the times.

scraped_reviews.content: You can't access the checking account. The icon just spins. Very frustrating when you can't access the checking account and that's the only way to deposit checks. The app has not worked well since Amex launched the Android version months ago. Same problems different app name. And customer service has no clue.

Impossible to reach costumer service, I've been trying to call for week now,several times a day but it never goes through, after 5 minutes you get automatically disconnected, also sent countless emails but never heard back from them, wasn't able to upload my bank account and my PPP loan which I was approved for is about to be cancelled regarding their emails they keep sending me only because I'm unable to verify my info because theirs website wouldn't let me and they don't communicate at all.

scraped_reviews.content: DON'T CREATE AN ACCOUNT! NIGHTMARE EXPERIENCE. Don't get carried away by Amex logo, this company is an absolute trash. They will never respond to your customer support requests. A simple transfer of money takes more than 3 weeks which let my small business in trouble. After repeated follow ups no one helped and I was delayed in making payments to my vendors and those 3 weeks was a absolute pain. App is worst too, buggy and unreliable. Don't create an account here!

Two major problems with this app. 1: ACH payments I receive from various companies do not show who they are from. They only say "Online Transfer/ Payment" and not who they are from. 2: You have to get a code via sms or email EVERY time you log in. Those are both dealbreakers, and I am closing my account.

Edited from one star to three. I did end up getting the loan Impossible to make contact Approved for a ppp loan but can't add my bank account online or via app, days you have to call but after waiting on hold it says they can't take your call and disconnects. Tried several times a day for 2 weeks so I'm forced to find another place for my loan when would have loved to just go with Kabbage but can't because they won't answer or even let you hold- they just disconnect the call
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please send us an email at ppphelp@kabbage.com

scraped_reviews.content: Tried to make a mobile deposit, repeatedly got the error "Your check deposit couldn't be completed due to a technical error." No explanation or way to fix. No way to make cash deposits, so mobile deposit functionality should be a priority.

This app is pretty buggy. And no way to contact support. Called twice and people sounded like they were 100 ft away. Main issue click transaction view all. Then click transaction and back. Now all your transaction are doubled in the app.. doesn't seem like high quality control is part of the app and makes me think twice about my American Express app.

Bad customer service, trying to mobile deposit a check issued by a county government and they say their third party fraud detection has determined it's not a good check. This is after a week of calling them and getting different answers such as reinstall the app, try again tomorrow, try again in 3 hours, etc. They accepted a check from the same customer 3 months ago. Also applied for their payment processing service to be able to accept credit cards 9 months ago it still says under review.

No fingerprint log in. Too many glitches. Five business days to transfer money is way too long. Majority of the stuff on website isn't on the app. The 30k points is what was needed to reel people in it seems like. Also why can't credit cards, savings, personal and business accounts be all together in one app?

interest rates are high, even after several loans they will not lower the rate. they offer deals say you will get them, and then they aren't on the loan. After your first loan, the monthly fees will decrease.

There should be an option to change it to log in with an email. I called and was told it can take 5 to 7 days look into this. Sadly the app is the only way to deposit a check. I need help and other options.

I was connected to my WiFi, then I tried it using my 5G, and it still won't work. What's the point in having an app, if I have to sign in through my web browser? I have an unable to access the app for a week running. Repeated emails to kabbage, one phone call session and even hit them up on Twitter and no one will respond to me. scraped_reviews.content: fix the error been like this for a month. unable to see account activity on business checking
Absolute best employees, amazing service, moving all my personal and business accounts from bank of America to Amex. Proud customer over 30 years.

Such a circus to set up an account, two weeks later I still can't set up sub accounts, and they will not issue a debit card to any other account owners. You get one debit card and that's it. By far the worst AMEX product I've ever experienced, I'll be finding a new business bank. Finicky and biometric access only works sporadically. I love Amex personal products but their business products are not proving to be user-friendly so far

Never works , ever. Tells you to contact them , then they have no clue. Told remove app and redownload it every time. That does nothing but take 15 minutes out of day . We left not trusting them with our funds . Can't get app to work , so how do you expect to keep our business funds?

Don't understand why alerts or notifications are blocked on the app. Not helpful when needing to know what's going on within the accounts. The usage isn't reliable and doesn't look polished like the regular Amex app. For a business focused app I was expecting much more usability

Horrible App. Stuck in login loop that begins login process and then returns to blank login page. Had delayed my ability to deposit business checking deposit for the day. Ready to give up on Kabbage. Customer support awful. Can't believe it's rated highly.

They updated the app and now it is an absolute nightmare to login. I'm glad I don't have much money invested in this account because I will be looking for another bank asap for my business affairs. I should just be able to login into my account without having to be sent a security code, and then redirected to AMEX. I was forced to create an AMEX login but it DOESNT WORK. This is RIDICULOUS.

always getting error messages and when I spoke to support they're saying that is because I have an Android device and they're still working on updates for Android. but why open up business? checking if you can't really use the app.

Wish it would have fingerprint or similar login, Like all my other banking apps. I have to manually enter login each time as well as enter verification code each time. Otherwise I love the app, but this is a big negative to me.

Good savings app but if you want a business checking to rely on and not have to have atleast 1 other accounts to even do mobil check deposits look elsewhere (Bluevine?) Provides great business checking rates but mobil deposit without another account and no Plaid are BIG ITEMS this app lacks.

scraped_reviews.content: Like other reviews state, this app and company almost make me want to close my long-time AMEX account--because they invited me to open this account as the new owners of Kabbage. I'll be contacting AMEX for sure. Cannot register my new card to use on new account. Never had anything like this go wrong with any other bank. Sent me new card and same problem. Multiple calls to cust service, no fix yet. Saga: Couldn't register new card via phone--it says invalid card number bef Im even done entering. Registration via phone fails, but it tells you to use the app or website instead. But neither online method even offers card registration! It shows my card has been delivered, but there is no registration link or navigation! Who designed this failed process that should be simple! Customer service folk and supervisors are very nice and empathetic, but have not yet resolved this very basic problem.

title: Prime Video
description:
Watch movies, TV shows, live programming, and sports including Amazon MGM Studios-produced series and moviesRoad House, The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, Fallout, Reacher, The Boys, and The Idea of You, and much more. Browse titles, search for your favorites, or enjoy movies and shows recommended just for you.

App features:
 ‚Ä¢ Download videos to watch anywhere.
 ‚Ä¢ Rent or buy new-release movies and popular TV shows (availability varies by marketplace).
 ‚Ä¢ Cast from your phone or tablet to the big screen with Chromecast or FireTV.
 ‚Ä¢ Create multiple profiles so each person gets a personalized entertainment experience.
 ‚Ä¢ Go behind the scenes of movies and TV shows with exclusive X-Ray access, powered by IMDb.

 For our Terms of Use and usage rules, go to amazon.com/videoterms. Amazon, the Amazon logo, and Prime Video are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates.

Browse titles, search for your favorites, or enjoy movies and shows recommended just for you.

App features:
‚Ä¢ Download videos to watch anywhere.
‚Ä¢ Rent or buy new-release movies and popular TV shows (availability varies by marketplace).
‚Ä¢ Cast from your phone or tablet to the big screen with Chromecast or FireTV.
