For our Terms of Use and usage rules, go to amazon.com/videoterms. Amazon, the Amazon logo, and Prime Video are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates.
summary: Watch movies, TV shows, live programming, and sports

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: I pay for an ad-free experience and they are beginning to include ads in the ad free subscription. The App has some problems. It will at complete random decide to stop playing whatever you're watching and return you home. When it does this, or when you decide to stop watching, it will quite often decide to put you sometimes a whole season or more behind where you left off.

Long time subscriber. Over 6 years to see a series only offered here. Even though you pay a premium for commercial free service you still see ads. Whether it's for an additional service or a prime video exclusive. Frequently freezes when it's opened and won't even allow you to select a show. You attempt to scroll down to see your "continue watching" list and it closes before you can even get there. I tried deleting the app and reinstalling, and am still seeing the same issues.

I have been paying for Amazon Prime for many years now. Given that the service is paid for, I see no valid reason for the introduction of ads. The past few months, I had paid the additional fee to not see any ads. There were still some ads, nonetheless. I decided to stop spending even more money for something that's still happening anyway. Now, the ridiculous number of commercials, plus movies restarting, making me watch even more ads, I'm will not be renewing my subscription once it runs out.

good library, TERRIBLE player. you removed the next episode from the list of options from the drop-down. the auto play cannot be turned off so it will just play videos forever, even if they're not on your playlist. it skips videos so I'll be watching episode 3 and it'll skip to episode 5. can no longer skip intro unless you catch that popup within 0.1 second. the old player was just fine. who changed it, a high schooler learning how to code? it's terrible. listen to the comments, FIX IT

Glitchy, ad-filled mess. There are frequent problems with connecting to a Chromecast, losing your place in an episode, and not loading properly. The bonus fun is if it loses your place and you're trying to fast-forward or rewind, it forces you to watch two minutes of ads over and over each time you stop. It just took ten minutes and a lot of ads to find my spot in an episode. It's amazing how bad this app is and how they nickel and dime you the whole time.

There's only some good shows, most of which are an extra charge because they aren't actually on this platform (so you're getting half-catfished). The ads are the final straw for me though. How greedy can you be?!? Amazon has so much money, but it will apparently never be enough. I'm already paying to use this streaming service at all, so there's no way I'm gonna pay even more just so I won't have ads. Also the ads are incredibly long, and incredibly often. This is ridiculous

There's a couple things that annoy me about this app. 1- When you watch a show, there's a lot more ads than if you were to watch a movie. Ads average around 15secs to was 2mins now they are over 4mins. 2- There's way too many add-ons (ex. Paramount+, Max, and AMC) and they should all be included in the price we pay for this service. Instead of a price for prime and a price for every other add-on separately. There should be different price packages and that we could add what we'd like.

I honestly used to love prime video BEFORE all of the ads became a part of it. The selection was also better. Now, if you don't want ads, you have to pay extra, and to see good films, you also have to subscribe to another channel. Prime video is enough as it is, but adding that extra fee to not sit through two minutes of ads is just reaching. Do better.

Too many ads. Watching a 1 hour show, there's 6 - 8 minutes of ads, maybe more, any more I usually look at another device during the ads. Also, if the phone falls asleep during the movie (or maybe the movie is paused while I take a call), when you resume the movie, many times the app restarts it back at the beginning - complete with some ads of course...

While there's a decent amount of movies to watch there are wayyyy too many ads. Even paying for a prime membership you'd think the ads were minimal but they're not. If you try to forward a movie there's another 4 minutes of ads. If you try to rewatch a movie there's another 4 minutes of ads. You will be watching minutes of ads the entire time. Not even 30 seconds, straight minutes of ads. Prime is only good for deliveries, don't waste your time on videos

The worst app ever to watch NFL on. It is painful. The inability to fast forward in a smooth fashion is so frustrating. Unless it's a matchup I really want to watch I won't bother because it's so annoying. Almost a year later in this app is the worst. I hate watching football on the Amazon prime app. It starts randomly in places in the game. If you're trying to start from the beginning, it'll drop you right in live TV. Nice job ruining football!

I honestly can't with these ads anymore. If I miss something a character says on a scene after an ad I can't rewind without having to watch another 2 minute ad. If I accidentally skip ahead of an ad not only am I forced to watch it for 2 minutes but then have to watch another 2 minute ad when I try to go back. It's absolutely horrendous. There's no point in watching shows on here anymore.

Got the app even tho I got netflix cause it seems everything I want to watch is only on Amazon prime. Amazon advertises "1000s of free movies" but of course all the shows/ movies I want to watch I have to pay to watch??!! Funny they don't mention that in advertisements. But then the free ones, by the 2nd or 3rd season into a series your interested in. You find out got canceled by Netflix. Not for me. I don't order enough on amzn to subscribe. It's all just a money grabbing scheme.

Love the concept, but wish there some were extra features. For example, the "continue watching" either keeps shows I'm finished with or doesn't always register those I've started, especially if they are from another app within this one. Also, I wish we could see the actor list from the app, as you can do with the television. Finally, when I rewind and hit play (from the television), it automatically pauses, which no other app does so I forget.

Good but annoying flaws. I like the content, but videos seem to lack contrast on this platform as since they're so dark it's often difficult to see what's going on. Further, 'skip intro' and 'autoplay next' do not work on downloaded content, and finally, despite paying for no ads, I often still get ads and have to click 'skip' or such to get to the video. I'm looking into switching to a different provider.

It's one thing that Prime Video isn't already included in the $139/yr Amazon Prime, but when you have ads, at least give some attention to how they appear. This app frequently forgets where you were in an episode. When returning to an unfinished show, it immediately plays an ad. Fine. But you didn't start me in the show where I left off, so I need to skip ahead. But when I pull the slider ahead to guess where I was and let go, another, longer ad. It's pretty infuriating. Is that by design?

the app glitches and will make you watch the same commercial break over and over without registering that it's been watched. A few adds are fine but they do it on purpose just so people get frustrated enough to pay for ad free. Slimy, weasel level dirty tricks. I will never pay for Ad Free from them now out of spite. Playing games like that is wicked. nothing more. nothing less.

worst experience i have ever had just trying to update billing info and restart subscription. no longer have phone that I set up the subscription with, but email is same. there is no way to change phone number and you can't log on without getting "code" that was sent to phone by text, except i don't have that phone anymore. I wasted over an hour doing everything I could to log in and I'm pretty pissed off at this point in time. I am deleting amazon prime video from every TV, phone, tablet.

This app plays okay, but usually loses my place when I need to pause. "Continue watching" drops content altogether, so I must search & recall everything from scratch. Or it will revert to earlier Seasons & Episodes I've seen. Often when I've subscribed to a channel (extra) drop-downs will suddenly be missing many Seasons that show up again after I go out & search in the browser, then click through a "Watch now" link. Why this app can't hold my place etc, I can't figure, but it's most annoying!

used to be a lot better until they started shoving more and more ads into it. its not even necessarily the ads themselves, though that is incredibly aggravating, its more that the ads seem to break the player and cause freezes and crashes. It's especially bad when the player is minimized (which you will want to do, to be able to use your device while ads are playing). the library isn't even that great. If I didn't get the service with my prime subscription, I'd cancel it.

So many bugs. It'll let you watch one episode then the next episode is audio only with a black screen. Tried to switch to other shows, still black screen with audio. Tried restarting app and phone without success. Came back a few days later, same problem, one episode then black. Also long time bug - continue watching is never where you actually left off. Frequently puts you an episode ahead or behind where you stopped, even if you were in the middle of an episode.

if I could rate less, I would. Terrible experience this past week. I havent used Amazon in almost a year but needed to order some books and tanning lotion so decided to renew my prime membership only to have all my orders canceled and my account closed for "suspicious activity" after providing them with photo id, pics of debit card, and bank statements! The app should've been my first clue as it took me two days to be able to create a prime account. Amazon has went downhill and will not use them

To anyone (in PH) subscribing for NBA, it's not worth it. Only 2 NBA games a week, and they get rid of the VOD a while after the live stream. Also, the subtitle settings went missing on android-- it's now just the default one with a black background. And after all these years, they can't be bothered to improve the sorting functionality and categorizing of content. If it wasn't for the free games on Prime Gaming/Luna, I wouldn't bother subscribing to this service.

This app sucks. First of all, you have to pay for a subscription, and yet you still get ads and all the stuff you want to watch, you still have to rent or buy. The media player is absolutely atrocious. The subtitles never align with the video. The progress bar doesn't align with the video. When you watch something on the app, the progress doesn't sync with the TV when you initially hit play. Don't waste your money.

What to say. Constant issues with buffering, audio/video syncing, loss of connection because "there's no internet" when every other app/device has no issues. Or Amazon cloud fails, a lot. When I purchase a show, I expect to see it when I play it, not a version from some 3rd party vendor wanting me to use their app instead of the video I PURCHASED Prime is unusable as a streaming service. Fire TV and Fire Stick devices both terrible, clunky, TV remote interfaces & battery drain.

App is garbage. Full screen isn't actually full screen and there's nothing you can do about it, video audio doesn't work via bluetooth, the movie download speed is atrociously slow and heavy to where you can't watch it at the same time that you download it. Netflix has literally none of these issues.

Often times the movie doesn't pick up where I left off, which is frustrating. When I rewind/fast-forward to where I was I have to watch ads even if I just watched adds before closing the app, only for a minute. Sometimes I make it through a section of ads and the app stops and boots me out. I log back in and it does it again. It's not connection speed as this doesn't happen in Netflix or Paramount. Many movies require subscription. 2 stars is generous.

Love it has all the movies i seen as i was growing up. Has really good series. Just read that in late January of 2024 price is going up 3 dollars a month for no ads. Not really happy about that. Was paying the extra 2.99 for add free but you still get 1 add in the beginning, you are able to skip it but what's the point if you are paying the extra you shouldn't get any adds period!!!!

I don't know what happened, but for the past few weeks I have not been able to go back to the first season of some of my favorite TV shows (i.e. Beyond Paradise-British show; Eureka, etc.). I no longer have the option to select various seasons or episodes. When I attempt to change seasons or episodes, it takes me to the Prime Video homepage. For shows I don't watch that often, the various seasons and episodes show up.

Video playback isn't even close to full screen but the ads are. Doesn't update where in the video I stop watching most of the time so when I start again I have to fast-forward and then...ads. And it's way too easy to accidentally advance the video nearly to the end and then ads and when you go back to where you were, more ads. And the warning for flashing lights never leaves. Seriously, this experience is awful.

My biggest problem with this app is the terrible screen aspect ratios of some movies/shows, with no option to zoom in or out. Tried watching a movie the other day, and the aspect ratio was about the same size of the screen of a small ipod touch. Almost every other streaming app has the option to change this, so why not this one? And that goes without pointing out the ridiculous amount of ads that are in very short episodes. I'll get almost five 1 minute-long ads for a 20min. episode of a show.

it was okay until they made ads the norm unless you pay an arm and a leg. even the ads are not too bad to deal with. but OH BOY. they literally got rid of full screen. I have purchased movies I've watched before and ALWAYS put on full screen. it doesnt have the option anymore. also the x-ray details are missing. how did you guys mess up this bad? terrible, terrible change for no comprehensive reason. and yes, I watched these movies regularly so I am positive about full screen just vanishing.

Latest update crops out half the video on most feeds. This is a video playing app. Shouldn't the playback quality be consistent? Even the captioning gets cut off. Everything is zoomed in on the left instead of full frame. Also, it can be starting or even in the middle of an episode then jumps to the next episode. None of these problems existed prior to the recent update, so it's not my devices. Please fix these bugs and I'll go back up to 5 stars. Thank you.

I expected a better experience from Amazon. I end up watching more commercials than show. When I pause, the app does not start where I left off so I either have to watch the same part of the show several times or if I try to fast forward then it bombards me with commercial after commercial until I can find where I left off again. This is my least favorite of streaming apps. Terrible user experience.

(Stuck with it crashing with an error? Try reinstalling it!) After their systems crashed last month, I was dealing with errors with no solutions to fix it, with the most being "clear out cache" or "update the app". I then tried something that wasn't in the suggestions: Reinstall it. That fixed it. Hopefully that gets shown to people.

I am sick of the mobile app. If you watch something and then close the app, then star again later, the movie starts up where you left off earlier. usually before an ad break. the ad you have to watch even if you already watched the full ad. Another issue is when you have less than 15 minutes left in the movie, if you are trying to resume it will say "watch from beginning?" and guess what? another ad plays. I get you want people to buy the ad free stuff. Just stop abusing us with the ads please.

The recent photosensitivity warnings update is a terrible decision. Every time any sort of action starts, a warning goes across the screen and distracts from the movie or show. I'm all for the warning at the beginning of the show or movie. I'll support having the warning there when you return to your movie or show (even from an ad), but come on, this is ridiculous. The one bright side, at least I'm not having to put up with this while having paid for the ad-free version.

New Controls are TERRIBLE! 1. The new app does not permit you to lock the video orientation as the old one did. The video will always rotate with the phone instead of being allowed to lock the video in a specific orientation (portrait vs landscape). 2. The old app would remember where you left off when you'd close the app. Not anymore; player will start at previous episode and not even remember that you've finished certain episodes! It'll start them over! Terrible!

Good show selection, but terrible controls in the app. There doesn't seem to be a way to simply skip to the next episode. There's also no way from within an episode to go to the show's main page to view all episodes. Additionally, the "continue watching" section never accurately tracks which episode I stopped watching, not where I. the episode I left off.

It's a terrible app. Basic functions don't work, but they can sure jam some ads down your throat. Often 2+ minute breaks before the show starts, followed by another break after the intro. If the app freezes, and IT WILL, you can look forward to all the ads again. There are so many better players that amazon could mimic. Instead we get remedial junk from the best the Jr college had to offer...Wow, the app continues to suck badly. They are to busy restricting access to fix anything.

I have been using this app for a while now. Today I noticed it has a new interface when watching videos, and I have to say, I miss the one from before. I could zoom in to fit my phone screen, have a button to advance to the next episode, and more. Now it seems stuck in large borders mode and has no way to modify the subtitle style other than off or on. Amazon, please, give us back those features!

I'm deeply grateful that Amazon is even more stupid than they are greedy. Since I'm not paying extra for no ads, I get bombarded with trailers for the latest film or series and after the 3rd+ time in one 40 min episode, I am so sick of it that even if I had been interested, I'm not any more. It's saved me a fortune in films and series they've persuaded me not to buy. The list of things they say they have but don't is getting so long, soon I'll be able to cancel Prime and get the channels direct.

Not enoigh free good programming. When you do find something you might like to watch, you have to pay extra or subscribe to another venue and pay extra? All of a sudden this app stopped working. Couldn't watch anything. When tapping on the customer service site, it never would open to make a complaint or let Amazon know the problem. Thus the app doesn't function and there's zero customer service. I deleted my subscription that I've had for years and unsubscribed from Amazon Prime.

Constant crashing on tablet. Seems to work fine on our FireTV and on my phone, but on my Samsung Galaxy Tab (not the newest one, the edition before the newest), the app opens, then immediately crashes. Can't even start a show. It will work ONCE after un-installing and reinstalling, then crashes again if I try to watch again later. It used to work just fine - anyone new to this app should wait until they fix whatever this bug is. It used to work just fine until recently.

Not only do I pay a subscription to Prime, and one to Paramount, but I pay to have ads removed on top of that, and still get ads! then I have to pay another fee to see anything worth while, and everyday more shows are added to that list. I can't even finish a series without having it put on the pay extra list. Not to mention it won't even play anything unless all my privacy settings on my phone are turned off!

I resubscribed and downloaded this app just for 1 new season I've been waiting for. this show isn't on any other platforms. I had this app for 2 days and now it doesn't work. I was in the middle of a movie when the screen went blank, and only had audio. I am paying for a product and downloaded its app for nothing! I saw this has been an ongoing bug, so why isn't it fixed yet?? when the season I've been waiting all year for is over, I will not subscribe again. this was a waste of money and memory

The adverts are a joke. I don't mind watching them when I'm actively watching an episode, but I was trying to skip to the end of an episode to see if I've seen it before, but I had to watch the initial ~11 second advert, then a ~2m 11s advert before I can check. No thanks. Adverts are also messed up if you wait a day. I part-watched one episode and watched the 2x ~2min adverts as part of the episode, then went to bed. The next day I had to watch the adverts again. What a mess.

They say the title is included with Prime and then they start showing commercials, well then it's not included with Prime when you show us as many commercials as Tubi. Might as well pay for Tubi, at least they won't show us commercials. I downloaded a movie and watched 15 minutes and it drained my battery 20%. I changed the background settings and cleared the cache. I watched another 30 minutes of the movie and it went down another 30%, totally unacceptable.

Won't run in DeX mode.. You still have to buy any good movies. The prime videos are all terrible. I don't recommend it. "Ad Free" is a scam. You still have to watch ads after paying for the "Ad Free" subscription. You just watch less ads with some movies requiring more. 100% false advertisement. This is not clearly stated upon purchase and therefore is illegal.

I fell asleep during a movie and I get that the movie doesn't know that. So I'm okay with restarting the movie and fast forwarding to where I left off. But wait... you gotta watch 3 mins of ads before you can do that. Sure, okay. So I watch 3 mins of ads, then I fast forward to where I left off and it happens to be past an ad marker. Well guess what, I get to watch 3 more mins of ads. Hulu surprisingly has that figured out. Amazon? Nah, just "easier" to make you watch more ads.

title: Candy Crush Saga
description:
Explore a world full of delicious match-3 puzzles and endless fun! Blast through thousands of challenging levels in this timeless puzzle game from King. Match candies, conquer jelly, toffees, and jam, and uncover sweet surprises in every puzzle.

Classic Match-3 Gameplay with Fresh Twists

- Discover unique game modes like Gummy Dragons and Bubblegum Pop. 
- Match and blast your way through matching levels full of sugar-coated fun.
- Master tricky puzzles and create explosive combos to clear the board!

Brain-Boosting Challenges & Special Events

- Daily Rewards: Log in every day to claim free boosters and extra lives.
- Time-Limited Events: Compete in themed challenges and win exclusive prizes.
- Tournaments & Leaderboards: Crush more candies than your friends and rise to the top to become the ultimate match-3 master!

Bonbon Blitz Your Way Through Extra Sticky Levels

- Use powerful boosters like Bonbon Blitz, Lollipop Hammer, and Jelly Fish to solve puzzles and boost your score.
- Stuck on a level? Boosters and extra moves will help you blast through any obstacle.

Play Offline or Online, Anytime and Anywhere

- No internet, no problem: Enjoy offline gameplay and keep the fun going wherever you are.
- Ad-free fun means uninterrupted candy-matching bliss!

Connect with Friends & Join the Candy Kingdom

- Share lives, compare scores, and see who‚Äôs the match-3 master in your friends circle.
- Connect your game to Facebook to sync progress, compete with friends, and unlock exclusive rewards!

Discover more from King

Looking for more brain-teasing fun? Try Candy Crush Soda Saga or Farm Heroes Saga for fresh twists on classic match-3 puzzles. Or dive into sweet solitaire action with the new Candy Crush Solitaire!

Candy Crush Saga is free to play, but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature in your device‚Äôs settings.

summary: Match your way through candy puzzles packed with fun and clever challenges!

scraped_reviews.content: fun game as always, but the amount of pop ups when you open the game and in between levels is so annoying. it wasnt like this the last time i played the game several years ago, and honestly it feels very desperate. i appreciate the free boosts, but with 5 concurrent event pages/pop-ups and daily real currency purchase packages being advertised all the time, i get fed up. i only want to play when i want to relax and unwind, but the ads and pop ups are just as annoying as real life...

I stopped playing this game years ago because of the constantly extreme hard levelsb but I was at 1584 when I stopped. Now, this game is even worse!!! lower levels are crazy hard and I'll be deleting it for every this time. the only way to win is if you spend money otherwise you're stuck for days even say the level I was on. 380! Total rip off! don't waste you time or money üò†

VERY FUN! HOWEVER, what is it with these games saying out of moves when I clearly have moves left?! I don't know if it's a bug within the game or what but this is the second match 3 game this week that had said I've lost the level because I've run out of moves and I can see I still have a few moves available. On to the good stuff, the colors are vibrant, the game is fun. It's enchanting and entertaining. I'm several levels in and I haven't had any ads.

Candy Crush is one of those rare games that stays fun no matter how long you play. The levels are colorful, creative, and always bring a satisfying mix of challenge and relaxation. The game‚Äôs smooth animations and cheerful sound effects make every match feel rewarding. What I love most is how easy it is to pick up for a quick break, yet it can keep you entertained for much longer if you‚Äôre in the mood. The special candies and combo effects never get old, and the constant updates mean great üëç

I‚Äôve been playing Candy Crush on and off since it first came out on the iPhone 3. It‚Äôs still a lot of fun and a great way to pass time ‚Äî simple, colorful, and surprisingly addictive. The early levels are satisfying and rewarding, but as you get further, it starts to feel more like pay to win than skill or luck. Still, it‚Äôs a classic puzzle game that‚Äôs hard to completely quit.

I loved this game. Played for years (over 9000 levels). But now it's a money grab. The levels are almost impossible to beat, so many hard levels now (8 in a row!), legendary (insanely hard) levels added (4 in a row!), fish power-ups ruin moves instead of helping like they used to, and not getting power-ups I pay for. I didn't think I would ever walk away from this game, but the fun is gone.

I love this game, but it is insane how much money they're trying to get people to spend to beat 1 level. Every other level is a nightmare level, which almost always requires you to use perks to beat it or you lose any buffs you've earned. They also do contests, so you can try to win perks, but they change the advertisement later, after you've spent money, to say it was just a qualifier and not the prize. Absolute scam. It's so frustrating I end up not playing for 6 months at a time.

I used to love this game, played it for years. but recently I have gone from passing 20ish levels a day to not being able to pass any except maybe 1-2 per week. I don't want to buy gold to get past every single level, but they're set up in way that if you don't buy gold you cant win. where as when you do buy stuff on the app, the levels all but win themselves by giving you boosters. if you aren't paying, the candy doesn't ever fall in a way that gives you boosters. app sucks

Edit: They are back to the ways I've posted below. Changed it for awhile, then do everything to get you to spend money to pass levels. üò° Don't Download! I have played over 8600 levels and I have been stuck on the same level for 3 weeks. Again they are taking away all the little helpful spins and ways to get bonuses to beat levels. Another push to get your money in order to pass a level. ü§¨ I will be playing Royal Match instead. This game isn't fun anymore!

The algorithm goes against you succeeding. The game wants you to purchase items so that you can pass the levels. I can see why Google won't give any kind of discounts to purchase items for the game because the algorithm is designed for you not to pass unless you purchase from them. I remember you used to get discounts to purchase but now you can't. Color bomb on to of most of the candies, and then it was clear, and there was a candy bomb where tcolor bomb could be. It didn't fall. Stayed there.

Looks Outdated for one. Graphics and Characters tend to lean more towards kids than adults. My 2nd gripe is that at the end of a failed level, if I haven't got enough gold bars then why does the bonus number keep rising with each failed? And this leads me to another issue where the constant flashing of the hint where the the program flashes what it thinks I should move. This is really annoying as im not allowed to sit here and think about my next move without being forced help. Not good.

I would've given more than two stars but then no. I just found out I cannot watch ads to get extra moves and boosters if I'm stuck in a level, out of bars and cannot buy gold bars. it's quite frustrating. I have to keep playing a level for long most times a week and there's no fun in that. please add back the feature that allows one to watch ads and gain extra moves and boosters not everyone can afford to spend actual money in buying gold bars. thank you

I've installed this game off and on over the years. This last install made me uninstall within the week. It's now just a fight through pop ups on pop ups on pop ups, all designed to keep you playing longer but all it did was make me annoyed that it took so long to get into the actual gameplay every time I launched it. They have overcomplicated what use to be a nice chill game.

uninstalled! its not a game anymore, it's just a platform for advert revenue. Most levels are complete first try, the more you play the more bonuses you get making each level even easier..... all for the purpose of getting you through as many ads as quickly as possible. Temu, Copilot and trading 212 on repeat sometimes the same ad 3 times in a row, with each ad begging like 40 seconds, then of course another 5 seconds after skipping to skip again for some reason.

the fastest way to destroy the game experience is an in-app purchase. I've been enjoying the game for 2 years and hit a rough patch and wanted to say thank you to them by making a small purchase. after that purchase the difficulty of the game increased exponentially all trying to drive more purchases. I used to be able to watch ads to get boosters but all of that disappeared. it killed my love of this game. I've uninstalled it and I'm walking away. I hope they change this behavior.

I just had to close 9 different pop ups before I could move on to the next level. I have uninstalled this game more times than I care to remember simply because of this issue. I only come back to it when I have absolutely nothing else to play, and for split second I have faith that maybe it got better. The mechanics of the game are not consistent and rely more purely on random chance. Although some aspects of the game are enjoyable, it gross to see so many ads from them.

I have recently given this game a try and I simply do not see the joy of such a game. The game relies heavily on luck, and minimally on skill, with the joy coming from long combos and lucky moves whilst the game tries to keep you playing with constant powerups that will last only a certain amount of time, making you feel like you are wasting them by not playing. On top of this, the game includes hard levels, that simply take hundreds of attempts to complete.

The game, so far, lacks any competitions, any teams vs. other teams, contests, etc. While other match 3 games have the ability to tap on a power up to activate it in the game, Candy Crush will only allow the power ups to be activated with a minimum of three corresponding colors. Gardenscapes is miles ahead of this game. The power ups are engaged just by tapping on it, they offer contests, and team competitions, and they have another subset of missions.

Don't Spend Money Ever!!! If you do, any bonus ads you had that you were using to pass levels, or any bonus lives you were getting are gone! King Games will take away the ads because they know you will buy, so they're algorithm won't let you have them anymore! It's a big money maker & just a scam! It should go back, but it doesn't and they don't answer when you email about it! I'm in the middle of the All Star Tournament & they are screwing me & won't give me back my way to win now!

Your ads with the green timer line are atrocious. When the X is clicked on to shut it out, more time than not, it opens the ad, and hitting the back button just closed the game and starts it over. This makes any rewards and win streaks go away when it's opened again. It's ridiculous that these glitches haven't been fixed.

I love this game. I play more then I should. This week is the next level of the live event. All of a sudden i don't get any boosters, extra moves, and it won't even allow me to use coins that I won. feels like I am being set up to loose. I even spent money for the first time and all of a sudden I have all these problems. I definitely will never spend another dime on this game.

I absolutely loved this game up until I got to level 200+. Most of the levels past this point are nearly impossible unless you actually put money into the game, which I have fallen into. It's addictive and entertaining. But if you're not looking for a game, you'll have to put some money into I wouldn't recommend it.

I have at least 10 years of experience playing Candy Crush, but there are some levels in it that are extremely rubbish, like Legendary levels where hundreds of jellies are locked and you only get between 15 to 20 moves. Similarly, hard levels, then super hard‚Äîit makes me want to uninstall the game altogether. That's why my request is to make the Legendary levels a bit easier and increase the number of moves. From my side, 2 stars for you.

I have been playing this game for a long time and up to now have found it okay, however today the game just cut out twice , turning the game off, and therefore losing my super boosters , episode race position and also taken out of the other game alongside to collect gold bars, as it appeared I had lost / position in the game. All my other apps work fine. Disappointing.

Played this for years. Best to over 4000 levels but too hard after that. It became unenjoyable, so started over. Other than that it is a good game and you do get rewards for watching ads. It has been made a lot harder. Once it didn't get harder until the 1000s. Good time waster too. If you are prepared to spend your gold bars, the hard and very hard become easier. Best to collect gold bars to help as the game goes on.

One of the very best games out there and it really goes above and beyond when it comes to keep passing levels with an abundance of great ideas and moves if you get stuck. Yet I have had to reset the game back to level one from level 1,010 because this game makes you spend a small fortune just to pass levels. I ended up spending over $100 in July then I said no mas no mas and deleted the storage data to go back to level 1 for the 3rd time. Plan on spending a lot of money if you want to advance üòÑ

King. Why do you keep lowering the bars for winning ≈ïaces? First the candy box was 50, then 40 and now it's 25 for the top prize. And the game is not a puzzle game. There is no more thinking to solve it organically. You rig it with AI and it's impossible to win. Its not cool. The new players will eventually see. The game is no longer fun. Can players at least share bars? You would still make billions. Share the wealth with your customers. Think about it.

I normally like playing Candy Crush Saga, but lately after watching the ad, when you hit the "x", it takes you to their website and when trying to leave it, you are thrown to the beginning of the game, losing your progress. it's very aggravating, especially when you are about to win a hard game.

I've been playing for years, and it's still one of my favorite. However, the game cheats. What are the point of jellyfish that don't help you win the game. I've literally watched them avoid the last piece of jelly multiple times. Also, I don't appreciate the activation of color bombs when nowhere near other activated candies. This makes the game less enjoyable.

Same old same old format of games- easy to start with, then really hard before you can finish a streak, having to use all your gold bars to get to the end. Extremely frustrating!The only way to move forward is to make an ingame purchase- never going to happen !!!!!!

Playing this game is no longer enjoyable. A game that involves cunning and traps over time. At the beginning, everything goes well and is normal. But as you level up and pass, the situation changes. After a while, it forces you to buy gold bars and boosters to pass the levels. It is impossible to pass the 'hard' labelled levels without the boosters and gold bars. So, you're forced to spend money here! Even if you buy some boosters or gold bars, they're not activating them correctly. Be careful!

The game is pretty awesome, it's therapeutic and adventurous but there's a few glitches that I would like to point out. ‚Ä¢ In most cases players are supposed to have their own choices but in this case every move is decided by the game's algorithm, meaning if I happen to make my own move it leads me to chaos, "most adults play this to shorten the day and have fun" but if a child is to play this they would hardly learn anything because every move is decided by you guys. pls change that.

Bad! I can't describe it! It will not work. If you think that a black screen is fun, you're smoking something more than a decade later, this is still really bad! you get cheated on lives, if you have the time to dedicate to the endless ads. most of the time spent "playing " is spent on going from one add to another! I swear, I'll never buy anything that is advertised like this. people come to a game to get out of the regular time of day not to be spending on watching adds!!!!!!!!!!

game is fun up until a point, but every round the 'candies' are randomised so it basically becomes more about random luck instead of skill. the later levels become unbelievably predatory in their efforts to get you to spend money, to the point where one level is basically impossible to finish without buying boosters or extra turns. the adverts and popups for in game transactions are incessant

I enjoy every aspect of the game except for having to keep buying gold bars. It makes me want to uninstall the game. It gets too expensive. I uninstalled it. The gold bars are too expensive. Then I got sucked into re-installing it and was really enjoying the game. Until I had to buy gold bars. It's like a snowball effect. Once you have to buy them once, the next thing you know, you're having to buy them all of the time. I hate it.

as of today the app freezes after every level won. go out and close the app and it starts back at the next level to play. I have restarted phone and cleared the cache and it still has issues. fix it please, if you have timed stuff to play with it sure wastes that time for you getting in and out of the app everytime.

Playing more then 10 years, best game ever on mobile üì≤. but now due to a bug unable to play, whenever gold chocolate box appears it stops no button to close it, I have to close the game. Apart that more achievement/ comparision date should be shown, it create interest.

I love this game!! However, the game keeps force closing & taking me back to my home screen. Fix the bugs & ill rate it 5 stars. If not fixed im going to have to uninstall the game. Edited: 11/11/25 Now the game keeps freezing. I have to close the game out after I beat a level. Please fix. Ive been playing this game for YEARS.

I honestly hate this game. It's not worth the money in the first place, but if you're not willing to spend real life money in game, it will start being against you. The game is at random so there's no skill to how you play. I shouldn't have to play the same level 33 times for the game to understand I'm not spending money. The moment you spend in game money to get through a level, the game completely finishes out the level for you. What's the point when the game plays itself most of the time?

I have been playing this game for a number of years, but some of the levels are impossible to win without buying gold bars. Some of the levels have 3 or 4 very hard or nightmare games in a row. the game isn't fun if one has to play the same game for a week or more to try to pass it, only to have to buy gold, then have the next game just as hard.

I wish that when I switch to a different device I could keep my timed power up boosts I earned. My battery died on my phone so I switched over to my old phone that had a full battery, and I was sad to see everything I built up wasn't there. my level was still the same. Tournaments started over. Power ups gone and had to started over in the race. I was in first. please fix this. this game is old enough that I feel this issue should be able to be resolved. it's unfair especially to paying players.

I'm a long time player so I've been through this a few times. Recently, 11-2025 , Music Season was added onto the game. This caused my Silver Chocolate Box to freeze. I ended up having to delete and reinstall the game. I saved my game but lost all my boosters AGAIN. Why?? One would think someone could figure out how to stop this.

gave 3 cuz click on right one don't go keep trying then goes to the one clicked on first place . how come when match up dont go then keep on then finally goes same spot i tried. no wonder say no more moves cuz its right dont do nothing keep try finally hits. i wonder to make us buy points which i have but long as dont go when its right i wont buy points. ty

THE GAME IS A JOKE MONEY GRABBING. some of the levels there just aren't enough moves to finish them on the first go with boosters so you use whatever gold you have to try and complete the level and by the time I finish u have no gold left and then when go to the next level you never get past that one so you have to buy gold

I downloaded the app again and couple weeks ago after taking a long break from it. the game gets frustrating at times. I was enjoying the new feature with the ads giving you extra moves or boosts but it seems to have been removed. I feel I won't get past the level I'm at as it has been a couple days. If I can't get past it soon I will be uninstalling.

I am sick of this game. It used to be fun. Now you have to pay to pass ridiculously hard levels, or wait weeks and weeks until they let you pass. Then, the next level is just as ridiculously hard, so it's a perpetual cycle. Pay money or wait weeks to pass that Level. It's an absolute joke. King, maybe you could split the game somehow? Ask players if they want an easy, medium or hard option of the game? For me, I'm done. It's turned into a horrible game now.

Hey, I have a complain recently. The complaint is that when I try playing candy crush it doesn't work at all it just freezes but the animation of the NPC are still moving. Is this a bug, glitch or an issue. Everything was fine when I started playing in the midday and it all started happening. Please, I beg YOU to fix this glitch! Is this an issue, bug or a glitch?

hello candy crush team....I hve some suggestions n some request to make the game more fun n easy ....as I love it ...plzzzzz do consider them.... first when we play a level n some moves are left plzzzz allow us to use them in further rounds so that we can pass a difficult level...n plz give more golds...as it gets finish off quickly...n why are ads not coming which helped a lot to get those helps... missing them badly

Loved Playing this game.... until, after over 10 years of playing it, it has finally stopped letting me win any level without buying gold bars, which I had never done before! Also, will not give me any of the adverts to win treats. Used to be addicted but rarely play it any more because it has gone downhill

Cruising right along enjoying the game. great for brain rot, but when I got to level 303 and 304, took 10-15 tries per level. I don't spend money on games to pass levels. Therefore, the game became boring, I will probably delete it in the morning because of that.

title: Five Below
description:
Shop Five Below: The Trendiest Deals Under $5!

Discover the coolest deals on everything from trendy toys to must-have tech, beauty favs, party supplies and beyond!

New to Five Below? Get ready for the ultimate shopping experience where nearly everything is $1-$5, plus incredible items over $5 that‚Äôll surprise you! From fun gadgets to exclusive collectibles, Five Below delivers the latest trends for an unbeatable price, making us the go-to brand for shopping on a budget!

Why Download the Five Below App?

Effortless Shopping Experience
Browse the hottest trends with ease! Our user-friendly app makes finding your next favorite item a breeze. With lightning-fast search and filter options, you‚Äôll find exactly what you're looking for ‚Äì plus, access over thousands of stores near you to shop in person.

Shop Smarter, Not Harder
Your shopping journey just got smoother! Enjoy an even better Five Below app with faster checkout, speedy shipping, and more seamless shopping from start to finish. Checkout securely using your credit/debit card, or multiple express options ‚Äì Google Pay, PayPal or Apple Pay.

Always New & Exciting
We‚Äôre constantly updating our inventory! Explore new arrivals in toys, games, Bluetooth earbuds, fitness gear, makeup, graphic tees, books, candy, room d√©cor, and much more.

Trendy Brands & Fan Favorites
Shop top brands like LEGO, Disney, Marvel, Squishmallows, Hershey, Crayola, EOS, Freeman, Sour Patch Kids, Trolli, Haribo, and more. Stay ahead of the trends with our exclusive finds!

Join the Five Below Fam!

We love our customers and we‚Äôre always improving to make your experience better! Tell us what you think by leaving a rating and review, and don‚Äôt forget to follow us on social media for the latest updates and sneak peeks of new products.

Follow us on Instagram, TikTok and Facebook @fivebelow!

Whether you're a long-time fan or new to the brand, download the Five Below app today and start shopping the trendiest, coolest stuff at unbeatable prices. Get in on the fun!
descriptionHTML:
Shop Five Below: The Trendiest Deals Under $5!

Discover the coolest deals on everything from trendy toys to must-have tech, beauty favs, party supplies and beyond!

New to Five Below? Get ready for the ultimate shopping experience where nearly everything is $1-$5, plus incredible items over $5 that‚Äôll surprise you! summary: Extreme value!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm dropping from 4 stars to 1. I've had this app for years and loved it. Now it's changed so when you push the back button after looking at a product it takes you all the way back to the beginning instead of just back to the previous product you were viewing. When you get to the end of items that you're scrolling through it automatically jumps back to the beginning you can't just go back and forth and you can't click on the last product. It's so annoying, I can't shop here now SO FRUSTRATING!!

Horrible! Ever since they updated the app for Halloween it has been almost unusable. Constant crashing and freezing, forever to load pages, and half the time you can't view your cart or checkout. I constantly have to close the app and reload it to do anything, view two pages, and then have to close and reload it again since it freezes. You can't create an account so no wishlist to save items, you have to search for them every time. No saved address either so enter ALL info every purchase

Completely useless for ordering a pickup. I initially tried to place a website order but it couldn't identify my correct store location. The app showed the correct location and allowed me to place items in the cart but "couldn't calculate taxes, please try again later". Wouldn't accept Gpay, couldn't complete the order at all. Guess they paid for a 5-below version of their app. Needs work.

The last few months the location/store feature on the app AND their website does not work correctly. It's only pulling up 2-3 stores that are 1-3 hours from where we live. I've uninstalled, reinstalled. I've cleared all cache and all storage. NOTHING is fixing the issue. We have many locations in the metro area of where I live & not a single one will pull up when trying to find a store to shop from. You can find these stores on the websites store finder, but you cannot select as your home store.

This app SUCKS!! I tried to place an order just today, and when I checked to see if my shipping address was correct, I couldn't access my account. Then about an hour later, I got an email saying that my order was cancelled because what I ordered was out of stock! PLEASE update the app when something is sold out, not after the fact! I've had this happen before, and I thought it would be corrected, since I haven't ordered from the app in quite a while. But I guess not. Please make this app better!

I'm gonna stick with the browser version, the app has so many bugs to where it's not worth keeping the app. When I hit the number or next for the next page, I don't want to go back up the page I'm on and when I look at an item and click back, I don't mean all the way to page 1... the loading time is slow and it's not my phone or WiFi causing it, it's the app bc none of my other heavy apps load that slow

a great app, although it does have it's faults. it's a bit hard to navigate around, there's no reviews for the items you buy and there's also no wishlist to save the items. it can be a bit laggy from time to time and awkward using. and i have a hard time entering my card info. however, aside from that, it's a good app. shipping is always very quick for me, and I haven't had any issues. UPDATE : A recent update made me no longer able to even add items to my cart... please fix this!

This app is great. A lot like wish, but the products are of a higher quality. (I quit using Wish bc of disappointing cheap products) They aren't necessarily luxury items but you don't feel ripped off and prices are good. HOWEVER it would be MUCH better if they let you make a lists of things you want to buy later. I'm constantly adding things to my Cart simply so I won't have to go digging around the app for them later. If they let you create "Wish Lists" I'd have no problem giving it 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your detailed feedback, and suggestion! We're always working on a better Hollar experience, and we hope you stay tuned for updates!

scraped_reviews.content: It's simple but where is the "save to list" option? Yes you can add things to your cart, but most online shops you're able to save items in a list for future purchases. This just deletes anything in your cart if you leave stuff in it. I had a bunch of gifts saved in a cart so I could come back and buy them after payday but they disappeared and I couldn't remember what I had added. Needs a save to list feature!

I love this store! I am so glad they have a app. But... It takes like 3-5 minutes to load up a page, and you have to re-login every time you open the app. My LOGIN'S don't work anymore. And yes, you need multiple logins. It's hard to keep track of all the stuff in my cart because of it. I also have to reset my password every time. Sometimes when I login it shows cart, then glitches. If they can make it faster, fix the logins, and the bugs, THEN I will give it five stars.

I placed my order; my bank account was charged but I have no ETA for my items. I forgot two items, so I tried to order them separately. The coupon I used for my previous order could not be used again and gave me an error message. Sent an email to support Sat. with my order number requesting the items be added. I got an auto response saying they were not available on the weekends, so I sent another email on Mon. It's Weds. evening, no response. Pretty shoddy customer service imo.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry that we had been unable to respond you immediately. We had been working with an unexpectedly high volume of contacts. We do see that one of our Hollar Specialists had been able to assist you on your order. If you have other questions, or concerns, please let us know in the same email.

scraped_reviews.content: They tell you that there are items in stock at your selected store when that's not the truth. I made a 5 item order for pickup, and they canceled 4 of the items for "not having in stock" despite it telling me it was in stock, and despite it letting me order. It's possible you'll have to wait 3-7 days to get your money back. There is no order cancelation option either from what I could tell.

Keeps having errors when ordering. They get my money, but I don't get a confirmation number, and then I get an error message. I have to call the 1-800# and talk with them forever just to get told," Well, if you dont pick up the items, it will cancel." I didn't even get a confirmation #. And the check out kept changing the amount I ordered. They have items on there that are out of stock or no longer available. And why do I have to pay so much to get it shipped. If I spend a lot, why charge?

I love five below and I've used this app many times to order items for pickup or to be delivered to my door. But the BIG thing it's missing is a wishlist or even a "save for later" button. I forget about items I wanted to get all of the time. I'll add things to my cart for a future purchase and then 3 days later my cart will be empty. Please add something so I can bookmark the items I want eventually, but can't get right now!

My first order was fine, no issues. My second order contained 13 items, mostly for Christmas, but only 3 arrived. Live chat does not work, and they do not reply to emails. 5 days after sending the email, a new tracking number was uploaded, but not expedited, no refund, no reply, and shipping is so slow my stuff won't be here in time for me to wrap and ship the presents.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your second experience with Hollar. We had been addressing an unexpectedly high volume of both orders, and contacts. Please rest assured that this is not the customer experience that we aim for. We'd like to see what we can do to make this right, so please send us a note with your order number at support@hollar.com.

scraped_reviews.content: If you love Five Below you will definately love the app. It has so much more options in the app than you would find in the store. Take my word for it, it will surprise you how much more options you have on the app then you would instore shopping. I was able to find so much different organization items and decor items. I was super impressed and was able to do most of my christmas shopping on here last year. I honestly would rather buy through the app now rather than go instore. It saved me money!

My first experience ordering from Hollar went very badly. The order was weeks late arriving and contained less than half of what it was supposed to. HOWEVER... from my first contact with their customer service when the order was late... I was responded to quickly, personally, and with apologies. I was kept informed throughout of what had happened and why. I was rapidly refunded for any items not delivered. I was given a store credit and free shipping on my next order if I decided to try again..

I ordered from five below, money was taken from my account, then they tell me it's cancelled and money was put back into my account but I never saw any money returned to me in my bank account. Then they ask me how well they handled the situation and I said 1 star and how money wasn't returned to me and no one has reached out for months. It's been almost if not two weeks already. Also for the items in your cart, you can't click on the items, which is dumb.

Hollar is like Wish's version of an online Big Lots. There's a ton of great deals, but there's also some not so great deals - overpriced stuff that's poor quality or that you can find in a dollar store for $1. If you're a savvy shopper, though, you will LOVE this site! I just wish they would bring back the program that let you pay a monthly flat rate for shipping on orders $15 or over. The app gives you more coupon codes than the website does, so it's worth having.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your detailed feedback, and for your suggestion! We strive to provide a fun shopping experience, and even better deals for our awesome customers, and we hope you stay tuned!

scraped_reviews.content: I love 5 below the store &the app, where I can find what they sold out of in stores, etc. But what I didnt like was the fact that I was still expecting a $5 shipping fee when I ordered 1 thing from the 'five beyond' section, but the shipping price was also raised. How is it that you can buy multiple $5 items and still only get charged a $5 shipping fee, but when you purchase 1 item over $5, it raises your shipping cost?

The app has been "lagging" since the last update. It goes extremely slow anytime you are trying to checkout, I mean the entire process takes at least 5 minutes. Also, I have been getting a TON of error messages when using the app. It is definitely something with the app because I can use the website and have zero issues adding items to my cart and checking out. It just sucks though it sometimes automatically goes from the website to app when going to a different page on the app.

What a joke!! Most items are way over a dollar and way over-priced. Items are marked as "clearance", but the "original" price is drastically inflated. This is nothing like a dollar store. After all the reviews about receiving damaged items, items missing in shipments, no response from customer service and seeing over-priced merchandise, I'll shop online at Walmart. I'll save money, better selection, better quality and receive free shipping. Plus, if I have an issue, I can call customer service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. We do our best to ensure that all orders are shipped in the best condition, and we then see to it that we're able to address all concerns if any orders do arrive in an unsatisfactory condition. We then hope you find satisfaction wherever you might order.

scraped_reviews.content: Glitches. The five below app is extremely slow and is nearly impossible to put in credit card information. The app will not load the 'continue' button after adding all the card information. I have to try to type 2 or 3 times and even close the app for five below to load up again. Sometimes, it'll add more to my bag than what I ordered. So, I have to triple check before checking out. I'd use this application more if it worked properly.

I love Five Below, but the app needs things to be added. One, there should be a wish list. Not everybody wants to buy everything at once. Two, you should have an estimated arrival time so people know when there stuff is going to arrive. I would also like more of one thing. Like more disney and stuff like that. I know your probably working on it. Other than that, I thinks it's great!

I love Five Below as a concept. The app needs a major update though. You can't go 'back' after clicking on any link, you have to start over through the menu. If you made an account previously, you can't access it through the link. I keep checking for an update but it's been months and it hasn't come. =/

Literally every item you select is removed from your cat because of "insufficient stock." I get items being out of stock, but the site nor the app tells you that. Seems like every item is in fact, out of stock. I've also had items ordered, had them held at my local store, told they couldn't hold it "due to insufficient stock", went to the store same day to find 5+ of that item on the shelf.

I absolutely adore this app!!! Other than maybe Dollar Tree, Five Below has got to be my favorite store ever and I'm 37 years old! The only thing that I can think of that could possibly make this app any better is a 'like' or 'heart' feature so there's a way that you can come back to your favorite items later on. And the option to create wish lists to save and share, would be EVEN better! üíö

overall very good app. reasons for 4/5 stars: 1)sometimes it allows you to add items that are listed as out of stock & that is confusing/unclear at times. 2) once in awhile the app crashes (Galaxy S22) otherwise the app is pretty straightforward and easy to navigate, so solid 4 stars. a few ideas: 1) it would have earned a 5/5 if it had a save option. 2) so many things are unavailable in stores, so would be great if there was a way to earn free shipping. $8 shipping is a LOT!

4/24 update: "easier to use" my foot. No longer can you sign in and view your shopping cart from device to device. No longer can you have your information saved because they made "checking out easier and faster"? And we can now(?) Pay with PayPal... ya mean the way I've been paying the last year or more? Rating down to 1 star. 10/23 Works well 60% of the time. [...] I appreciate that I can get my items delivered for a fair price.

Love this store and app! I have found so many great deals on toys and candy and even household items, that would normally cost double even triple at other retailers. I would definitely recommend checking them out. Plus customer service is very helpful and friendly. I've had two orders delivered to a different state and they were so helpful, they sent me the same stuff to my actual address with no problems. Thanks guys!!

An excellent store that in my mind and probably should be in yours to has replaced all of the dollar stores as the cheapest place to get cool stuff. I got a surround sound there three years ago that I still have for only $25! Crazy right? So much cool stuff on site and this app just adds to the ambiance of it's greatness. Try the app, try the store, just try it already! What do you have to lose except for five bucks in exchange for something awesome?

Needs more organization, to have list added, and the option to send item links through messages. An option to filter by price. I'd also like if clicking an image would show the items in the images and link to them or say if available or not. I've seen things I wanted and had either had difficulty finding or never found those items. Then do a google image search to just see I couldn't get it. Also Could be sorted better, for example, with each other, or lamp to last lamp, pillow to last pillow.

Love the app, except when you go through checkout. There is no way to double check that I chose the right payment option or that it is being shipped to the correct address. Also I can not add other shipping addresses should I choose to send out gifts. I would like to go through stages when checking out and then have a summary at the end to double check choices. Then I can at the very end, click a button to confirm purchase.

The application lacks user-friendly features. It does not provide the ability to sort items from high to low. When a user clicks on an item while shopping, it redirects them back to the previous page without retaining the search settings, such as in-store or ship-to-home preferences. This necessitates the user to restart the search process each time they add an item to the cart or wish to examine an item. Also doesnt save items n your cart.

Great savings and smart holiday items. There are a lot of good gift ideas also. I miss the membership. We paid $2.00 a month and could order many items or a few and had free shipping. I don't live near a dollar store so I shop on hollar when I needed a few things. Now I take the bus and spend time shopping and hauling heavy items.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Nice to see you here, Madeline! Thank you for your kind words, we feel so loved. This will definitely make us work even harder. Let us know if you have any questions, we're always happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I've ordered gifts and items for many occasions . Christmas gifts are great to find here. There is some great deals and some deals not so worth it. I'm a huge bargain shopper so sometimes I can find things cheaper at local stores. I've never had issues with delivery or shipping. It comes in a big orange box you won't miss so make sure you watch for your package so it's not stolen.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your detailed, 5-star review! If you have suggestions for an even better Hollar, you can send them to support@hollar.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I love 5 below. My problem is with the app. I had one order to pickup and one for shipping. I got part of the order for shipping, you guys took care of that issue. But the pickup order was cancelled without any reason why. When I placed the order I made sure not to include any out of stock items. I just placed another online order today and I hope I get everything.

I enjoy using the app and love in store pick up, however, there are a few things that could make this app better. - a "save later" option instead of deleting my entire cart to purchase just one or 2 things - a wishlist to add items to so they don't HAVE to sit in my cart - automatic location is not a good feature. deletes from my cart if unavailable even though I don't want to swap my home store - it doesn't have accuracy for In Stock items ever. A lot of cancelled orders.

It's okay. I do not enjoy that my cart items disappear when there's a change or that I'm not notified when something is out of stock and what item or when I get an order and they swap the item for something random in same price when out of stock, just please give me a refund and let me know it's out, I don't want random junk. I also really wish you could create a save for later list, I sometimes don't want to buy all at once.

This app is great. I just wish they had more things I could buy. The most expensive thing I've seen was probably $15, but in a store I'm sure the item of been more expensive. I haven't purchased anything yet, but I think the shipping stays at $5 no matter how many items are in your cart/purchased. Which isn't too bad at all. I'll update this when I'm actually able to make a purchase (about the shipping price/how long it takes..) bit as of now, looks like I'll be doing my xmas shopping here,lol

This App is HORRIBLE! Everytime I shop, and once I reach a certain number of items in my cart...my cart clears and all items are lost. It rarely let's me sign in and is constantly glitching. Every shopping experience has some type of issue. My app will crash and all items in my cart are lost. I love 5Below but they really need to work on this App.

The app doesn't work like it should. It doesn't allow you to filter by price or size. The options only say "featured" "best sellers" and "new arrivals", which I don't understand what the difference is or how it's relevant to my search. There's a filter to show what's available at your store but it doesn't work and still shows me items that can't even be delivered. Unrelated to the app, but I noticed the store is really unfriendly towards plus size bodies. They don't carry anything above an XL.

Unfortunately, I don't have a five Below near me, so this app is a game changer for me!!! Now I can still cash in on their bargains and have it delivered!! I just ordered for the first time yesterday (4/09/21), so we'll see how long it takes. Also, no annoying ads. I assume because they make money when you place an order lol

Get this app ~ you won't regret it! Having used it 10+ times w/in the last 6 mths, I have zero complaints. Every time I've rec'd exactly what I'd ordered w/o issue, and all at a flat shipping rate of $5.95 -no matter how much I'd ordered! Has a simple layout, that's easy to use, & I like that products are shown w/several pics, from diff angles, & have good descriptions. *Note: They do tend to run out of the more popular merch quickly, HOW-EVER they also add new items daily! : > ))

Well, I'm having to change my review because now for some reason I can't login & have to shop as a guest. This is somewhat annoying because of having to checkout. I use PayPal & it's just become a headache! Not with PayPal but 5below! Says I need to login, go to login, takes so long to load & then says "login failed" or "no account". Made a new account..."count already exists"! It's so frustrating!

I ordered from Hollar last year. Just a few little things to see if it was legitimate. Sure enough, I got my box in about 7-days and put in a second, larger order. That too arrived after about a week! If you're on the fence about trusting the app, just buy a couple things to start with. You won't regret it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for sharing the Hollar love. We're super happy to hear that you love your Hollar goodies, and that both of your orders were successful. We appreciate the love and support!

scraped_reviews.content: With the name change it is worse. You deleted al my past order ƒ∫ogin and history. The products not so good. The gategories you removed kitchen and home. You deleted a lot of products from Holkar. Shipping was free over $19. Now no free shipping. It should be at least free if over $25 or $35 like other online stores. I dont know yet about shipping speed. My 1st order only says standard shipping. Disappointed so far And the app still always runs very slow.

Payment Trouble I love the idea of ordering fun stuff and things from 5 Below which may not be in local stores. There was a holiday decoration I wanted to order. Unfortunately the app didn't want to take any of my payment methods! I even purchased a digital 5 Below gift card to pay for the purchase but the app would not allow me to use it. It was very frustrating.

Do NOT make purchases from app for Christmas (in store & online). Majority of products are out of stock and you have to wait 2+ Business days to receive funds back. Last Christmas, I had the same problem but thought in a years time frame the company would be more accurate about inventory.... I was wrong! The app is constantly running slow and frequently showing error messages. They have increased prices yet have been unable to provide an app that's functions properly on basic commands.

The app is good because of what is sold. It gets stuck updating. Items better when it sold all the kitchen and variety of organization items. It is good for cell phone accessories etc. the shipping fees too much. It should lower or be free if over $35 - $50. But thank you. Your customer service has been really. Thank you. Hard to find this online so 4****. Please do something with the shipping costs. It's way too much. Thank you.

title: foodpanda: food & groceries
description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we‚Äôre here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we‚Äôll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets ‚Äî Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar ‚Äî foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!

Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you ‚Äì big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We‚Äôve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash ‚Äî everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here‚Äôs a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.
