scraped_reviews.content: Had the worst experience ever. I ordered Popeyes through the app and had to wait 1 hour and 30 minutes without any delivery attempt. There was NO WAY to contact support from the app, and the restaurant is not picking up their phone, so I had to go to the restaurant. Restaurant could not give my food because of foodpanda rules, and they had to contact support. The support said for them not to give my food. In the end, they canceled my order and I had left inconvenienced and disappointed.

disappointment at its peak. payment processing takes so long and pays the money itself without even placing the order, and yeah, you guessed right, no refunds. it's not about money. It's about trust and humanity. i am uninstallling it, but I have the worst experience.

I use foodpanda not just for food, but also for the PandaMart and shops! The variety of options‚Äîfrom high-end restaurants to local hidden gems‚Äîis fantastic. I especially love how often they offer exclusive vouchers and discounts that make ordering out affordable. It‚Äôs perfect for exploring new cuisines or just grabbing quick groceries. If you love saving money while getting great service, this is the app to download!

I had been waiting more than an hour for my order but got notified that my order got cancelled. Not once this thing happened. But many times. After that, I've to wait to get my money back. And for the voucher I had used, I've to use it again in 5 to 10 minutes or the voucher will be burn. And there's no customer service phone number to contact. Foodpanda has incompetent customer service.

I am extremely disappointed with my experience. This is the second time I've encountered issues when trying to report problems with my order. Each time, the app crashes unexpectedly, and when I reopen it, I can no longer report the issue. To make matters worse, there are no support tickets available in my requests. This app has been problematic, especially when it comes to reporting issues related to sellers or the app itself.

so so frustrating...every two/three months this app asks me to put my number and verify it which I already did ..and when I put my own number to verify it again, they say it's already registered...have been happening wway too much and many of the urgent times, I am not able to order because of this issue! so frustrating ...would rate less than 1 start if I could

Foodpanda really outdid themselves: a delivery app that somehow doesn‚Äôt deliver from anywhere I actually want. All the good restaurants? Magically ‚Äúunavailable‚Äù in my area. But hey, I can always order from the same handful of places I could literally walk to. What a groundbreaking service. And the delivery fees? Absolutely premium‚Äîfor absolutely nothing. If the goal was to make a delivery app that defeats the whole purpose of delivery, congrats.You nailed it!!

never use this app. 1.double charge your order from your credit card. happened 3 times. 2. ask customer service they will hang up with you. 3. place 1 order charge you 2 times no refund back to you. happened 2 times. 4. driver still at the same place, until the shop closed, you can't find anyone to help. minimum waiting 1 hours. to cancel yourself. if can give zero star , I will give.

I'm having an awful experience from the last few days; whenever I place an order! The app just freezes up for like forever, and when I close the app, after an hour or two, I usually receive emails telling me that my order has been placed and that I should go pick it up, even though I'm not in the mood or free to go at the time. Worse, they did not cancel or refund the order. They are literally looting people. There should be cancellation or refund options.

I ordered at 12pm. Before ordering, the app showed 30‚Äì40 minutes delivery time, which was reasonable. But once I placed the order, it suddenly jumped to 50 minutes. Now it‚Äôs already 1:30pm and the app still shows another 30 minutes of preparation time. This is extremely disappointing. Customers who need to eat before returning to work should not be misled by inaccurate delivery estimations. please be more accurate on your time. your sorry is definitely not making any difference

Made an order, shows restaurant is preparing for a whole 2 hours until i contact the live agent which ended up cancelling my order. since there is no email or place to contact for support, there is no way for me to feedback my experience. Just this incident today, snowballs my entire day of experience (appointment cancel, no lunch etc). furthermore, there is no apology made at all (both the merchant and foodpanda itself). this is a sure uninstall for me

I'm putting 1 star here, it's because they always have delayed delivery. they kept on extending time, i know some unexpected things happens sometimes but not most of the time.! what the??? and you can't cancel your order because it was being prepared already. all you can do is wait and wait!!! i've waited 1 and half hours for a 20 minutes trip from the other app. i subscribed but will stop subscribing now and even uninstall this app..! gosh!

Recently its taken a turn for the worse, three times over the past month I have had a glitch where it glitches out while placing the order, doesn't show the order as placed and when placing your next order it finalizes the previous order alongside your new order and cuts money from your account twice. Customer support was also terrible, neither cancelling the order, nor refunding. They just keep saying they'll take note of the feedback but clearly if they did this bug would be fixed by now.

The service is fine. But I never like their system. I think it is poorly made. I ordered for grocery which is 24/7. It was open when I booked it. I recharged the balance coz I thought adjustments will be easier if there are unavailable items. Turns out, the store closed while I was doing the recharge. So when I placed my order, it says it's closed. Thank you so much, I am unable to buy rice elsewhere and I couldn't get back my money to buy somewhere else.

the app works but the customer service side is the worst I have ever experienced becauae there is none! this is the worst food delivery experience I have experienced. a one hour wait for food because the driver had multiple orders. my food arrived cold and there isn't even anything to do about it. its actually better and faster to order direct and pickup the food myself.

Hey foodpanda, don't be lame.. None of the vouchers you gave can be use. Keep getting the error message saying voucher cannot be applied. It seems like you're fooling me. Make me waste so much time trying & trying. And now, even if your deals are completely free of charge, i'll never ever use your platform again.

Spoiler alert: you do not save money when you buy pandapro, the vendors simply set food prices above their normal prices and on the app, it LOOKS like there's a good discount, but you're paying more or same. Thus vouchers and points are not good in this app because 1) You have to Activate the Task to get points 2) Vouchers have a minimum value Edit: All prices across the Pickup option has soared. Rest in peace. Riders nowadays also do 2 apps, and they can get away with it, no enforcement

Amazing.... Sign up says pandabaru discount when I apply it says can't apply to this account. Amazing... I'm a new user trying for new users but doesn't work No diff so I've uninstalled since this app doesn't function like it should. Lose one customer... Also my phone number added but it won't let me sign up as the sms doesn't get sent... Tries on 3 different phones and number. Amazing... U lose a customer. Bye lousy app

Thieves. Constantly downgraded customer service, rider straight up tells not bringing order after which they make you wait for 1.5 - 2 hours after which you can cancel it. the support chat just vanishes and their representative acts like you aren't responding, leaving you unable to return to the chat to continue. one example, their rider texted that I won't deliver the food, I am too far away, so cancel the order. they then cancelled it and didn't refund my money saying that I asked to cancel

I today tried paying with easypaisa first time. it said payment wasn't completed cz of error. I then did it again n it worked. the order was received too. but I noticed from my easypaisa the payment was taken out twice! I'm trying to get a refund but no response from foodpanda team.

on 2nd November 2025, I tried placing an order but I got an error message instead. When I tried the second time, my order was placed ; turns out the first time the order was placed as well, but the foodpanda app didn't notify me the order was placed. My money was deducted twice. Fix your app !

absolute worst possible food delivery app one can use. It shows free delivery when that's not the case, shows the restaurant is available but is not opened yet (even though the restaurant is a 24 hr fast food, but when you order, it's scheduled for a certain time), and added a "service fee" as if delivery fee is not expensive enough.

this is my first time be using the app and then I was selecting a payment method which is cash on delivery then suddenly it's not available!!!! I want to order and the food be deliver in my place then the option in there is that I have to pick it up by myself?!!!! what is wrong with this appp??!!! this is crazy for goodness sake!!!!

For the last 6 months I have had the worst experiences using foodpanda. I get off from work around 3-4 am in the morning and everytime I order the first few riders just accept the order to complete their total number of orders and always fail to deliver. Insteas they prefer roaming around the city and the app takes at least an hour to identify this before changing the rider. I've also had failed transactions through jazzcash app and they refund after 14 days only....

Extremely disappointed with Foodpanda‚Äôs service. Riders are clearly not trained well and don‚Äôt follow delivery instructions. My food was sent to a completely different place, and the ‚Äúproof‚Äù picture was somewhere I could hardly recognize. No call or message from the rider either. On top of that, the refund process is very slow ‚Äî support keeps asking for unnecessary backup like I‚Äôm the one at fault. No proper customer service number and the in-app complaint options are useless and poor experience

imagine ordering from a restaurant in Foodpanda and after you place your order and pay using your E-wallet and restaurant call you to tell you that an item that they listed as available is not actually available so you cancel the order based on that information and then you find out that Foodpanda is rewarding the restaurant with the cash you paid despite there mistake or error and denying you your refund because you canceled the order after the restaurant said the items aren't available.!!

I've just ordered food and have been waiting for 2 hours with no info or change in the app to indicate that it was cancelled or a problem, no call or notification to indicate a change and they left me nothing more than a sorry message with no refund. Just the worst app to order food. find a better alternative than this

I don't know how you manage this kind of business, but your customer service is really trash. There is no option for customers to conveniently contact support if there is something wrong with their order, like if it took 2 hours for their food to arrive. I ordered my food online because I'm too sick to go out or prepare my own food, I even set it on priority so that I get my food as soon as possible. Very inconsiderate. Promised me a specific time but it still took more than an hour to arrive.

I always order from foodpanda. but from a few days their service has become so pathetic. they deliver order after more than 1 hour. and also there's no option for talking with any agent also talking with an agent doesn't solve the issue. so pathetic service. and after one hour you can't even cancel your order. they also never give any vouchers despite being their regular customer. like I order daily. so now the experience has become really bad and their service has just become so pathetic.

It's really convenient when you don't have anyone to get you any groceries or meals but at the same time they charge more than 250 , we have to pay platform charges , delivery charges and even sometimes the price is not the same as on the branch. so if you have money then it's alooooot easy for you

I had a bad experience with this app. I made an order but the app can't process it and showed an error but I thought my order was not received and processed so I made another order from another restaurant, it was smooth. But suddenly my first order came. And I had to pay double because of this app error and incompetence.

When a payment error occurs you wait for half month to a month to get your money back. System keeps cancelling my orders but payment still goes through. If you are not careful you will notice the deduction and they won't notify you unless you tell them. There is something wrong with the app. This is not the users fault anymore if it keeps happening all the time.

used to be great. but lately the order delay is HORRIBLE. We try to order early at 530pm to avoid peak time. But as of now 1 and a half hour later at 7pm, we are still waiting for our order !!! and the app does not even allow you to chat with support! Only until we figure out that we have to click "Cancel the order" then it can activate the chat function (that's like after 1 hour delay) If such delay keep recurring, think we might just give up entirely on Foodpanda...

Nowadays, customers are left at their mercy ‚Äî no hotline, only chatbots. I placed an order for island-wide delivery, which was accepted. However, it was rejected later and cancelled by the delivery man without any notification that there would be no refund. After multiple chats with support, I was informed that the entire amount, including the $6.99 delivery fee, is non-refundable. I'm now exploring alternative channels to report this unacceptable practice. Take note of the cancellation clauses.

No issue when everything is okay. Problem comes when theres issue on your order. Missing items are not refunded. And the agent are useless (they only copy and paste standard replies). App is not user friendly when comes to after sales services, when you close the chat with agent stating "I will be back", there is no way to to go back. Maybe it's FoodPanda way of dealing with those orders with issues to brush people off? Overall experience very bad and disappointed.

Foodpanda used to provide very good service. I even subscribed to free delivery for one year, I think for around 2000 rupees. But for the past 2 to 3 months, my orders are constantly being canceled. I don‚Äôt understand the reason behind this. If you want to increase the price, that‚Äôs fine, but at least stop canceling the orders unnecessarily.

I ordered and paid the bill online. 5 mins away the rider cancelled my order and the app says I cancelled the order in the help. You know as well as I that I can't cancel the order once it has been confirmed. I reached there social media but to no avail. They won't refund my money. An application of this status should have some kind check and the customer should be given priority and precedence. Improve customer service too because I can't find any way to complain except feedback and email.

Adding service charge only makes it more expensive. Also, when using saver delivery, it takes a long time for a rider to pick up my order that the restaurant had to contact me and offered to use lalamove instead and asked me to cancel my order. However, there was no cancel option and no way to contact customer service. Been using food panda for a long time and this is the worst experience that I have.

I was chatting with Foodpanda ‚Äì Lotus about a duplicate order, but I couldn‚Äôt read any of the replies. I kept tapping the chat button, but the messages wouldn‚Äôt show, and suddenly the chat just ended by itself. Because of this, I‚Äôm not sure how to request a refund. In the past, there were also times when I was charged extra because some items were out of stock, but I didn‚Äôt really know how or when the refund was processed. Hope you can improve on this. Tq.

Ive used this app multiple times. Developers need to create an option for people to cancel their orders ESPECIALLY when its been NEARLY 2 hours without any delivery attempts. Not only that, I've also encountered some of the worst drivers‚Äîthose without manners and asking for extra charge. This app went down the drainhole. It may be easy to use but there's hardly any improvements to this app.

Getting frustrated with this app. So many restaurants are either closed or not available, and it keeps telling me something is closed at the moment and to order for later even though I've already set my order time for way later. Something's wrong with the interface and maintenance and it's very clearly losing to GrabFood on a lot of aspects.

The reason of this rating, is because just now, I received a order with totally wrong item, therefore I proceed with requesting for refund. End up, the customer service without asking for further detail and just closed the conversation, and not consider any corrective action such as refund. Just to clarify, the wanted item I have ordered is expensive than the wrong item. After this I will not consider using food panda anymore, due to the poor after-sales services.

super horrible experience. i always order from here and didn't have any problems before. I noticed they added a little fee now which I don't mind. I've always chose the savers option and didn't have a problem until now my orders are always delayed, no communication, horrible service. i have to wait at least 1hr for any order and by the time i receive them it's cold. i recently ordered drinks and got them after 2hrs, melted and watered down. support team did nothing but "submit" a complaint.

Just had the WORST customer service experience ever. The agent gave inconsistent answers. First saying I could get refunds for BOTH my orders within 30‚Äì45 business days, then suddenly changing it and saying one of them was non-refundable. I was about to ask for clarification when the chat was abruptly ended. Absolutely unacceptable. Shame on you, Foodpanda and Sam. Do better!

The app is very bugged. 1. sometimes the checkout button disappears, you have to go out, put your orders to the cart again and again until the pink button suddenly decides to show up. 2. sometimes when you pay, app says there is an error, no order showed in the app but you got messages from your bank that food panda took money from you. 3. when you are texting with the CS, if you exited the app, you cant ever go back to the chat page and continue. The homepage texting icon is useless.

Haven't used the app for a long time. Now I recall why. Made a priority order but the order is one hour late. No notification from rider or the restaurant. Difficulty with recourse for issues. Used a "Wemissyou" voucher. The irony. Why did I even bother with this app?

Worst application! There is no way we can contact the support team in case there's any issue. If you place an order the amount will be deducted from your account within 5 seconds and then you will probably receive a notification that the things you ordered were out of stock and that the amount will be returned (which in reality will never be returned). I had money in panda wallet which got deducted in an order and 10 minutes later, I received a notification that the order has been cancelled.

worst ever support. I started using this app to save my time. But now I'm facing a lot of issues with their service and their support is very disappointing, you can't even talk to any person to resolve your issues, therefore I'm quitting this, hope will find another alternative.

Very disappointing,I ordered thru app since I was pregnant and craving for mang inasal and paid thru credit card.Sad to say my delivery didnt arrive even though the delivery guy marked it as delivered and sent a picture of receipt as proof.We tried to approach the customer service trying to retrieve the item then the system timed out and I cannot report for an unreceived order anymore.Hope preggy people craving food wont expect much from this app.Just try to order on the resto/fastfood insteadüò°

Used to be pretty great, but ever since the last app update, every time you need to contact the rider it takes you through the Help Center, which takes a lot more time than the previous methods. The app keeps loading and loading and loading every time you need to text the rider or get a text from the rider. You're charging for convenience but you've turned it into a hassle.

title: Capital One Mobile
description:
What‚Äôs on the Capital One Mobile app? All of your accounts, and so much more.

Whether you‚Äôre out in the world or feeling right at home, you can manage your money with ease:
‚Ä¢ View balances and export statements
‚Ä¢ Pay bills and take care of loans
‚Ä¢ Check in on your credit with CreditWise
‚Ä¢ Activate a credit or debit card when you need it
‚Ä¢ Redeem rewards on the go
‚Ä¢ Send and receive money with friends and family using Zelle¬Æ
 
With the Capital One Mobile app, you can ...
‚Ä¢ Stay informed when you enable alerts and purchase notifications
‚Ä¢ See everything that happens on your card with detailed transactions
‚Ä¢ Instantly lock your credit or debit card from anywhere
‚Ä¢ Get answers from Eno, your Capital One assistant

Download the app for better banking with Capital One.


Internet access is needed to use the mobile app. Check with your Internet service provider for details of specific fees and charges. Service outages may occur. Capital One customers are responsible for regularly checking their account statements. Push, email, and SMS alerts and notifications, including purchase notifications, must be enabled to be received. CreditWise monitoring and alerts may not be available if the information you enter at enrollment does not match the information in your file at one or more consumer reporting agencies or you do not have a file at one or more consumer reporting agencies. Features may not be available to all customers. Actual experiences may differ from those depicted. Additional terms and limitations apply. 

¬© 2025 Capital One, N.A. Member FDIC. Zelle and the Zelle related marks are wholly owned by Early Warning Services, LLC and are used herein under license. To read about the Terms of your download, check out the End User License Agreement.
https://www.capitalone.com/digital/mobile/android-eula/

summary: Bill pay, card lock, check deposit and more - all on the Capital One Mobile app.

scraped_reviews.content: This has been really good to use. There's not much I'd change. Not sure, why, exactly, that it has to use the merchant's website for offers, etc., when some will only let you use the app for purchases, etc., but other than that, this gas been really helpful & keeps most info in 1 place, for quicker & more secure access, without messing up log-in info so easily, etc. To the developers, thanks, for making the app!! üòÅü§ó

It's a pretty good mobile app, but it has two fatal flaws that are extremely irritating: you can't put in exact cents in a payment, you can only put in round numbers. When I'm making a payment to cancel out a purchase, I want to pay off the exact purchase amount. Forcing me to go to the desktop website to do this is counter-intuitive and irritating. Also, if I want to take a screenshot of an expense, let me take a damn screenshot!

Account details no longer opening so I can no longer see interest rate, etc for accounts which is frustrating. PLEASE FIX THIS! I rarely use bill pay after it was "updated" but I have moved on to other ways to pay so I can live with that. I do like how easy it is to open and close accounts and see them all in one place and the ease of accessing the app.

This version of the app is broken. Everytime I try to log in it says my account is locked due to too many login attempts. Then, it opens a web page to verify my identity and I can log in there, but if I go back to the app it's just the same message. My only option is the web. For clarity I can log in on the web if I go directly there. It's only the app that's broken. Edit:They updated the app and still didn't fix this issue. Totally useless app. The old version on my old phone does work lmao

Great app, easy to use. However, I'm not happy about the discontinuation of the pattern login. I can't use fingerprint login due to having small fingers, and I hate typing in my password every time I log in. There's very little chance of someone else getting a hold of my phone or tablet, trust me . Also, it would be nice to be able to file a dispute on the app without having to waste time on the phone with someone I can barely understand.

App was great for awhile but I'm glad to see I'm not the only one experiencing being frustrated with no longer retaining my sign in information. I've signed in using biometrics for years now but every time I go into the app it has amnesia. This makes the process of doing anything way longer. Whether I'm trying to pay a bill or just get a quick glance at my balance before I swipe is now a process. Especially when every time u do it over again for nothing! Fix it please smh

Would like to like this app, but it has three annoying problems. The first is that managing eno virtual numbers is just not possible. The second is organization - finding what I want isn't easy... in part because eno is a dumb bot, as well as a virtual card manager. You end up wasting time trying to get the right text only to land on an unexpected web page. If you try to use the web, it cycles back through the app. 2fa is a hassle. I really don't want to have to have my phone to bank online.

Cool app everything you need at your finger tips. HOWEVER, since I'm supposed to pay on time I think that Capitol One should have to take their money on time. I've paid through the app and it's 3 or 4 days before you take it out of my account, which sometimes , makes me late cause you didn't get your money due to me paying other bills thinking you have already been paid. It's really aggravating.

Worst app on my phone. Takes forever to load, if it even does without crashing. Since they disabled text balance checking, I have no choice but to log in all the time. Between this and the change to Discover debit cards, which don't allow instant transfers in most apps, I'm so frustrated. The overdraft credit line is the only feature keeping me at this point.

Bill pay service could be easier to use. its impossible to skip just one monthly payment without canceling the entire series. The CONSTANT cheesy ads, advertisements, coupons are annoying and make the site feel like a Kmart blue light special. If you set up your account online you don't get the same level of support compared to opening one in a physical location.

It's a good app that's easy to navigate, but all I have is one credit card. The app has a lot of banking information that I'm sure people find useful, but I'd prefer something more tailored to my situation. And for some reason there are two large box sections right as the app opens letting me know I have two charge accounts that have been closed. They've been closed for several years, so why do I need this information every time I open the app to manage my one current credit card?

There is no running tally for your balance. If you want to see what your balance was 3 weeks ago you need to add up all of the charges and deposits. This isn't just a visual thing either. One time I manually deposited the entire balance on my card then the card deposited money because an automatic deposit was already scheduled. I can not prove this because there is no running tally. When I called customer service they only had the information the app displayed.

been nice to have a card to make all my purchases with, I don't care to carry cash around. my $300 limit is a little small, so I am having to make multiple payments, paying is simple, easy. although the time it takes to run the payment is a little slow. Sometimes I am declined as the limit is too easily reached before I get a chance to make a payment, wait the several days it takes to make room for more purchases. overall, my capitol one card is performing well, I can track my purchases,spending

overall, it's a good app, it's reasonably fast and most of the time it works properly. Update: It's not as fast as before anymore. Also, there's a bug that won't let me turn off the two-step verfication, although I turned it off twice, but actually it's still on and ask me for the code every time which is really annoying.‚òπÔ∏èüëéüèº

It's easy to make payments, but they're pretty useless at anything having to do with credit reporting. After I responded to a text saying I didn't authorize a charge, they had me cancel my card and STILL charged me. When I contacted them they had barely any helpful information. when I asked about my credit report they said they aren't allowed to give advice or talk about it and gave me 3 numbers I have to call now to try and see what's up. Also a bunch of annoying advertisements on the app

The account details button is gone. They moved it up on the app, but it doesn't work when you click on it. I can't view the interest amount accrued on my 360 savings account. A workaround is going onto the website instead of the app and clicking on the account. it's the only way for me to view the account info, too. if they don't fix this, I will switch. It's bad enough that certain payments and transfers take so long to process! will switch soon if not fixed.

Mobile deposit is the most frustrating part. If you have a check for more than $500, the app just can't seem to match the amount. If you have an amount less than that? No problem! So, the bigger checks that you usually really need can't be deposited. Oh, and if you've checked the box on the check saying it's a mobile deposit, you're totally screwed because you can't take it to a real bank then either..... I've called customer support over this, and it usually magically works after that!

Overall, its a great app and easy to use. My biggest issue right now is that account details is currently inaccessible for savings accounts for the past few weeks. other account types it works, but not for savings. I can go onto the website and it works there fine. not the end of the world, but annoying when I want to check the interest rate

The "account details" option doesn't work on the app. I have uninstalled it and reinstalled it multiple times. and it has this weird glitch. Every time I log in to my minors acct right after, it does the access code verification even though I am using the same device. and it continues to do that constantly, when it didn't do so before. it even affects the other profiles I manage. After logging into that minor acct, it requires me to do the access code verification for all of the apps for days.

Worked great when I had an iPhone, but I recently switched to Samsung and now I'm having issues with the UI under "I want to..." Sometimes I can see the pay bills, transfer, send money with Zelle, etc. icons and other times I cant. On top of that, I can't virtually view my card numbers anymore! That was one of my favorite aspects of this app on my iPhone, but whenever I try to now, I get an error message. I've tried every troubleshooting step over the phone w a rep, still not working!

I frequently look at the app to check balances. I use it to book flights. The "watch" function is very helpful and we use it to find the best time to buy tickets, and the partial refund if the price goes down after relying on this function gives us great confidence we have a good price. We have had credits from this function on a few occasions.

My bank gives me a daily transaction history. Adding and subtracting in real time. The capital one app gives a monthly report. It seems like an easy way to steal money from me. I can not tell in real time what my balance is. Certain payments will show up days late. and deposits don't change the balance immediately. Very sketchy app

Typically would be 5 stars, but I've been having issues with the app lately. I can't view my "Account Details" in the quick access bar under my savings account & can't view my account information at all in the app. Edit: Looks like they fixed it and I can now view the account details in the app! Updated my review to reflect that. Only critique is the amount of pop ups telling you about their other products - which aren't relevant to me at all. Otherwise, app works for my needs

I am trying to open the app and it will not open. I go to the website. It says there's an upgrade available, I press 'upgrade now', it goes to the Google Play and there's no upgrade selection to choose nor is there an 'open app' selection. I cannot take care of any business online or in the app!!!! Very Disappointing! I've never had any issues/problems before. Very Disappointing!!!!

The app is fine, arguably the best in the online banking world. But I was just hung up on, literally, because the supervisor could not help me and her only recommendation was to"Zelle my money to a trusted family member". In other words, Capital One isn't competent enough to function with making a debit card work, so, transfer your money to a better bank. For 6 months now every card they send has a chip reader that won't read and when you try to swipe it considers it fraud.

very hard to update ANY payment information to link accounts to pay my bill. Twice my payments have been rejected when paying from the app. I searched EVERYWHERE to find/check/and edit payment info. My credit union informed me that it was on Capital Ones end because their system isn't even recognizing the payments (2) that i attempted through the app. I'm going to check the app one more time, and if I cannot find what I'm looking for, it will be deleted and I will just phone in my payments.

when it works, it's fine, but signing in can be a pain, there are constantly popups and overlays with offers of features I don't want so I have to click through them every time I use the app, the virtual card info display sometimes works. the 'try again later' error is b$. I can't customize the display to not show upcoming transactions that are sometime next year so I'm always scrolling to get past them. My expectation is that it should be as easy and efficient as apps like Fidelity and Schwab.

Was working fine, but all of a sudden I can no longer see the interest rate that my account is receiving. Called to ask abt this and they simply said the app is being worked on and they can't tell when I'll be able to see my interest rate again. What kind of terrible service is this? And I'm sure this goes against banking laws or rules. ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Can't manage virtual cards. No matter what, the app can't add my new credit card to Google Wallet, and the error it gives is unspecific and useless: "We Hit A Snag" / "Looks like we need to fix something so we're working on it". Customer support couldn't help, and asked for an error code. There ain't one, thanks to the brilliant Capital One engineers!

This is the only one of 4 credit card apps, plus 3 banking apps, that prevents me from screnshotting an individual transaction. It's a pointless and inconvenient security measure. This means if I need to prove a transaction, I have to log in to the online account? This is half the reason I have the app! might as well uninstall now.

Don't ever bank with Capital One. Credit cards are fine, but never give them your money. They are not a bank. Their app sucks. It's impossible to deposit finds into your account because they don't allow you to see your routing and account numbers. What good is an account that you can't deposit money into. Spent 30 minutes on the phone with support and NO ONE, could tell me where to find this info. Absolutely ridiculous. I'll take my money back to my old bank

wish the "view account details" button worked on my s24. now I have to log in with a web browser, 2FA each time, then locks my account after several correct attempts throughout the day, wait 24 hours for it to clear. what a hassle, had a late bill because of this issue, was told by bank support they couldn't help, that the bill will just have to be late. literally my first 30 days with this bank and already a bug. everything else is great minus the bug. and yes ive done everything I can here.

Now they require the "primary user" to actually log in to your phone to approve adding a card to your wallet app. This is insane, as you should not be logging in on anyone else's phone for any reason whatsoever. They could send the other person's app a request, or text them a code, or basically anything else. This company is incompetent in the extreme.

I made a payment on this app like I do every month, and they restricted my account because they say my bank account, that I always pay from, is new. They also say that their great service flags the account when there are several multiple payments/very large payments, of which I didn't think the once of month payment with this month being $29 even met this requirement. Then they stated that they wanted to make sure that I had enough money in my account to cover this payment of $29.

This app is helpful when it's time to make a payment. But for help with questions you asked isn't helpful at all . Especially why your credit score dropped 50 points when you made a payment on time . And no one here helps at all And then you call them and they don't know anything about Credit wise, but they can see your credit score. And that card you took away was saving it to help me finance and get a loan for implants. That card you removed. Now I can't get a personal loan. I'm in tears!!!

Current version downside is the account details is broken so I can't see any of my numbers or other important information. it's a pretty big issue to have for a banking app. Overall it's easy to use and does exactly what I need. I like having zelle built in and getting the checking direct deposit a day early. Refunds or transfers always come in sooner than expected, and always get the notifications of withdrawals immediately.

don't have much to say..but it would be a nice thing to get our paychecks cleared faster..i mean if they've been run through the system more than a couple times and clearing each time what's the problem? why keep our funds locked up for such a long period of time. To hear my opinion that's unnecessary and really bothers me it sucks if you need the funds fast or have an real emergency! it isn't like you can't get compensated. with interest Tagged to the amounts deposited.!

just when i think you're getting better you remind me how much you suck as a bank. i was forced to get a new debit it card, tried to verify it and use it "uh oh! error!" now I'm locked out of my account for 24 hrs and, despite being told there is a 60 day grace period for places to still use my old card, i have text alerts left right and center of bills not going through due to not having the correct card number. capital one, i loathe you.

Absolutely terrible. I got my account set up and now I can't even use it become the moronic app refuses to recognize the number associated with the account, despite it being the only phone number I've had and the only phone number that ever was associated with the account. So now it's completely useless AMD not having access is impacting my ability to pay bills. I'm guessing it'll suddenly start working a right AFTER the time period where I was apart to deposit money to get $250 elapses.

Very unreliable! This app WILL have you stuck in emergency situations! I have been stuck in multiple situations relying on this app. from not having access to available funds due to inability to unlock card to very vulnerable and dangerous ones!!! After traveling over an hour to get to a capital one ATM!!! Worked just fine until emergencies came into play!!! Very unreliable! DO NOT USE CAPITAL ONE as your primary banking source!!! When you call all they say is sorry there is nothing we can do

App updated and now it's impossible to find my account number and routing number. Every time I try to click the view account information it doesn't do anything. So now who ever decided to move this information that used to be convenientally on the main screen without needing to search for it screwed everyone from ever finding it again. Thanks a lot A$$hol. Fix the app I need my basic account information.

Easy to use! Easy to navigate. All of my banking info and Capital One credit card info is conveniently in one place. I can track my spending and pay my bills easily. I never overextend myself and always manage to keep up with my payments. Plus I have Zelle, making it easy to send & receive money whenever I need to. Great App, great bank!

One of the dumbest things Capital One could have done was partnered with discover. I was sent a new debit card but it starts with a 6 which is a credit card number & now I can't use it. When I go online to try and make purchases for places that don't take credit, it tells me to enter a debit card number, not a credit card. Well,it is a debit card. Also my local grocery store is employee owned and does not take credit cards so I can no longer go there. Now I have an account I can't use.

If you have recently opened an account, close it. if you're thinking of opening a checking account with them, don't. They now use Discover as their provider, having bought it, which almost nobody accepts. On top of that, I keep getting errors that my new card isn't associated with my account. Support was of NO help!

Overall it's a great app. However I cannot access the travel portal via the app. I have tried deleting the cache and data, even reinstalling the app, which did not help. I tried calling support, and they were no help either. Every time I try to open the travel portal on the app, it just says "We hit a snag." The travel portal works fine on desktop though, just annoying that I can't use it on the app.

Account Details not opening. The updated app moved the account details widget to the top and it no longer opens. Cannot view things like interest rate on my savings account. This seems deliberate so you can't see when/if interest rate is inevitably reduced by Capital One. This change along with new debit cards on the Discover network will make me change banks.

I have never been able to send or request money from Zelle. I select "send/request", the app starts thinking and then the app crashes every time. Fix ASAP it has been well over 1 year. I have to have them request the money in order to send it. I can't do anything within the app. Yet when I download Zelle, it prompts me to use the banking app.

I'm split. Great bank, misguided credit card provider. The app itself is loaded with UI glitches that aren't being resolved. The credit card is useless. They work on the principle of starting customers with a small credit line and increasing it only if you spend at your limit. Chase, TD, or Wells Fargo are far better for credit cards. Maxing out a card isn't healthy. Capital One needs new leadership for it's credit division, an obvious idiot must be running it at the present.

UI is confusing and unhelpful. Went through the steps to replace a lost card, which prompted me to lock it, and but no replacement was ever sent out. Started getting notified that bills were bouncing off the locked account and had to call and demand to talk to a real person to find out why i hadnt gotten the replacement, as the ai tool they try to route you to is entirely unhelpful.

I have been with this bank for quite some time now. and all of a sudden whenever they switched to their discover card, I have been unable to see the tab -which mysteriously disappeared- that displays your account and routing number. I contacted customer care but they are clueless and they don't get back with you!

Not to mention being unable to use the app when it's syncing because its literally stop responding until it's done. You'd stop an entry and wait several seconds which made the app a pain. scraped_reviews.content: New user as of October 22 in fund transaction, etc.. I was duped into their cashback and offers couple of times. title: Air Navigation Pro
description:
Discover our flight planning & real-time navigation app for free for 28 days!
- Everything you need to fly around the world
- Plan your flight in a few minutes
- Fly relaxed with up-to-date information

Air Navigation Pro is a high-quality flight assistant app for pilots worldwide. Benefit from the following main features:

MOVING MAP
Plan and navigate using our interactive moving map. Choose between aeronautical charts, satellite or our vector map as a background. On top of that, the moving map displays waypoints, NOTAM, obstacles and airspaces from our comprehensive, always up-to-date worldwide aeronautical database. Tap on any waypoint directly on the map to easily create a route. Personalize the values shown on the navbar to have exactly the information you need: altitude, vertical speed, bearing, distance to the next waypoint, ETA calculations, etc. Choose the airport departure and arrival procedures for your route to have them also displayed on top of the moving map.

ENHANCED TRAFFIC AWARENESS
Get visual and audio alerts in all languages for nearby conflicting traffic. Choose your preferred traffic icon between generic, aircraft or TCAS symbols. Your safety is important to us, which is why we partnered with SafeSky to ensure our users have live traffic data during their flight. Benefit from the native integration with SafeSky included in our new Smart Lite, Smart Classic and Smart Advanced subscriptions‚Äîa two-in-one package!

ADVANCED WEATHER LAYERS
In addition to the basic weather reports of winds and TAF/METAR for your flight, subscribers of the Smart Advanced plan can activate see-through weather layers on top of the moving map. Available layers include rain radar, wind, pressure, clouds and rain, visibility, gust and additionally for Germany, Switzerland, Austria and the Balkans, GAFOR reports. Tap on any point on the map to see the weather information for that area. Review the weather forecast for up to three days ahead.

NOTAM
After creating your route, set the departure time in the future to have the moving map display the NOTAM active for that specific time. NOTAM on the map change color dynamically based on their status.

SMARTCHART
Our cutting-edge SmartChart is a highly detailed and intelligent vector-based map that adapts to your needs, providing you with adequate information at any zoom level. The SmartChart optimizes the display of shadows to easily distinguish between valleys and mountains, and the text remains perfectly aligned, guaranteeing optimal readability. Including the latest significant improvements with forests and detailed airport information.

ELEVATION PROFILE & SYNTHETIC VIEW
Enable the profile view below the navbar for enhanced situational awareness of the elevation ahead of you or along your route. Choose the corridor width between 0 to 5 NM and overlay options: airspaces, NOTAM, obstacles, wind components, populated places, etc. Switch to the synthetic view for additional terrain information, plus an artificial horizon with altitude and vertical speed indicators. This function can also be used to pan around while preparing for your flight. Activate TAWS on the moving map as well as on the synthetic view.

AERONAUTICAL CHARTS & APPROACH CHARTS
We offer the most extensive worldwide catalog of aeronautical charts, including the ICAO charts. Have the georeferenced approach charts displayed on top of the moving map or the synthetic view. 

BRIEFING
Prepare your flight with our briefing section by creating documents with NOTAM and weather charts & stations relevant to your planned route. Optimize time by creating an aircraft profile which will be used in the Briefing section to pre-fill for you the ATC Flight Plan and calculate the W&B.

AND SO MUCH MORE!

A subscription allows you to use the app on three devices. We recommend creating an Air Navigation account for improved device management. Refer to our user manual on our website: www.airnavigation.aero for more information.
descriptionHTML:
Discover our flight planning & real-time navigation app for free for 28 days!
- Everything you need to fly around the world
- Plan your flight in a few minutes
- Fly relaxed with up-to-date information

Air Navigation Pro is a high-quality flight assistant app for pilots worldwide. Benefit from the following main features:

MOVING MAP
Plan and navigate using our interactive moving map. Choose between aeronautical charts, satellite or our vector map as a background. On top of that, the moving map displays waypoints, NOTAM, obstacles and airspaces from our comprehensive, always up-to-date worldwide aeronautical database. Tap on any waypoint directly on the map to easily create a route. Personalize the values shown on the navbar to have exactly the information you need: altitude, vertical speed, bearing, distance to the next waypoint, ETA calculations, etc. Choose the airport departure and arrival procedures for your route to have them also displayed on top of the moving map.

ENHANCED TRAFFIC AWARENESS
Get visual and audio alerts in all languages for nearby conflicting traffic. Choose your preferred traffic icon between generic, aircraft or TCAS symbols. Your safety is important to us, which is why we partnered with SafeSky to ensure our users have live traffic data during their flight. Benefit from the native integration with SafeSky included in our new Smart Lite, Smart Classic and Smart Advanced subscriptions‚Äîa two-in-one package!

ADVANCED WEATHER LAYERS
In addition to the basic weather reports of winds and TAF/METAR for your flight, subscribers of the Smart Advanced plan can activate see-through weather layers on top of the moving map. Available layers include rain radar, wind, pressure, clouds and rain, visibility, gust and additionally for Germany, Switzerland, Austria and the Balkans, GAFOR reports. Tap on any point on the map to see the weather information for that area. Review the weather forecast for up to three days ahead.

NOTAM
After creating your route, set the departure time in the future to have the moving map display the NOTAM active for that specific time. NOTAM on the map change color dynamically based on their status.

SMARTCHART
Our cutting-edge SmartChart is a highly detailed and intelligent vector-based map that adapts to your needs, providing you with adequate information at any zoom level. The SmartChart optimizes the display of shadows to easily distinguish between valleys and mountains, and the text remains perfectly aligned, guaranteeing optimal readability. Including the latest significant improvements with forests and detailed airport information.

ELEVATION PROFILE & SYNTHETIC VIEW
Enable the profile view below the navbar for enhanced situational awareness of the elevation ahead of you or along your route. Choose the corridor width between 0 to 5 NM and overlay options: airspaces, NOTAM, obstacles, wind components, populated places, etc. Switch to the synthetic view for additional terrain information, plus an artificial horizon with altitude and vertical speed indicators. This function can also be used to pan around while preparing for your flight. Activate TAWS on the moving map as well as on the synthetic view.

AERONAUTICAL CHARTS & APPROACH CHARTS
We offer the most extensive worldwide catalog of aeronautical charts, including the ICAO charts. Have the georeferenced approach charts displayed on top of the moving map or the synthetic view.

BRIEFING
Prepare your flight with our briefing section by creating documents with NOTAM and weather charts & stations relevant to your planned route. Optimize time by creating an aircraft profile which will be used in the Briefing section to pre-fill for you the ATC Flight Plan and calculate the W&B.

AND SO MUCH MORE!

A subscription allows you to use the app on three devices. We recommend creating an Air Navigation account for improved device management. Refer to our user manual on our website: www.airnavigation.aero for more information.
summary: Fly safely and easily with our flight planning & real time navigation app!

I urgently need your help to resolve?  Any help?  Why do you not support your app and queries from your customers? Please urgently help
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Grant, regarding the error 500 from Google Play kindly contact Google Support for further assistance. Possibly when you cancelled your subscription, it didn't push through. On the other hand, we have sent a reply from your email. Kindly write us back with your purchase confirmation. Blue skies,

scraped_reviews.content: I have been a user for about 5 years. Had a couple of small issues, but that disappeared with the updates. I find the maps a bit cluttered with writing, which obscures important points. Can you maybe find a way to turn the writing off and on?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Marius, thanks for your 5 stars :) Please email us at support@airnavigation.aero so we can further look into this map issue. Thank you for your understanding. Blue skies, The Air Navigation Pro team

scraped_reviews.content: i bought the app in 2015 paid version, used it for quite some time, i didnot use for some time in between, but i want to use it now, the app says me to spend some 5000 indian rupees again. why ??? i bought the app for android on google play store and i have the history of play store purchases . kindly help. sumant. i want to add on some words to above review. the response to my query was absolutely prompt and good. thanx
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello sumant,
Thanks for your review :-)

Blue skies,
