descriptionHTML:
Training Plans*, Guided Runs**, health and fitness tips or community challenges ‚Äî run towards your goals with all the tools you need. Run the distance with the support of Nike coaches, there for you every step of the way. Half marathon training, wellness runs and more.

Set a new personal best and discover movement where you‚Äôre at with the support of the Nike community. Let‚Äôs run together.

5k to 10k, Half Marathon and more - get started with health and fitness tools for all levels. From Guided Runs** and Training Plans* to fitness tracker and health monitoring features - unlock a fitness app equipped with everything you need to achieve your goals.5k or 10k, marathon and more - NRC has you covered.

Hit the trails or start your cardio training on the treadmill. Nike Run Club provides the motivation you need with community support at every step. Create and share challenges with friends or join one alongside runners worldwide. Health and fitness is better with a crew ‚Äî get started with a challenge today and stay motivated with the Nike Run Club community.

Nike Run Club is more than just a fitness app ‚Äî it‚Äôs a running community for Nike Members. We map running routes, coach you along the way, and provide health and fitness tips to help you recover on your days off. Download today to become a Nike Member and reach your goals with NRC.

RUN TRACKER FREE
‚Ä¢ Track cardio, running speed, GPS, elevation, heart rate & more
‚Ä¢ Distance & fitness tracker - Track progress towards your running goals
‚Ä¢ Mobile running coach - Monitor fitness progress with your own virtual running coach
‚Ä¢ Activity tracker to Android OS supported devices - easily sync your stats

TRAINING PLANS & GUIDED RUNS
‚Ä¢ Run toward your goals with the help of NRC Training Plans*
‚Ä¢ Half Marathon training, 4-Week Get Started Training Plan and more - Select plans that best suit you*
‚Ä¢ Marathon Training Plan - Begin the ultimate 12-week training journey*
‚Ä¢ Casual run, speed intervals or marathon training - Get started with our library of Guided Runs**
‚Ä¢ Fitness motivation from the best of Nike like Eliud Kipchoge with Audio Guided Runs**
‚Ä¢ Running coach guidance with NRC‚Äôs Guided Runs - you‚Äôre never running by yourself**
‚Ä¢ Receive or send friends motivating in-run audio cheers

RUN CHALLENGES
‚Ä¢ 5K to 10K and beyond - Earn badges and trophies for streaks and personal bests
‚Ä¢ Fitness app motivation - NRC provides encouragement to reach a new monthly running mileage or set a distance goal
‚Ä¢ Run in NRC running challenges or create one and invite your friends
‚Ä¢ Fitness tracker - Monitor and celebrate progress towards your goals with your worldwide run club

MILE COUNTER & SHOE TAGGING
‚Ä¢ Distance tracker for all your shoes - Run worry-free with a mile counter that tracks every pair and reminds you when it‚Äôs time for a new one
‚Ä¢ Running speed - Our pacer helps you learn which pair you run the fastest in

NIKE FITNESS FEED
‚Ä¢ Health & Fitness Guidance - Wellness tips for all runners, covering motivation, nutrition, athlete stories, and more
‚Ä¢ Nike Running - Check out the latest from Nike Running, including Guided Runs, Run Playlists, and footwear drops
‚Ä¢ Holistic Wellness - Unlock the best of fitness apps and more with mindset and recovery tips to connect mind and body

Download today and discover movement where you‚Äôre at with the Nike community.

-

NRC works with Google Fit to sync workouts and record heart-rate data.
Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nike.plusgps&hl=en_US&gl=US

NRC is supported on all Wear OS watches and many more, including Garmin

*Training Plans available in the US, UK, JP, CN, BR, FR, DE, ES, IT.
**Guided Runs available in select countries.
summary: Running for Beginners to Regulars: Guided Runs for 5k, 10k, Half Marathon & More

scraped_reviews.content: Great app for scheduling and tracking my runs. I do wish they could add an audible distance marker for the interval speed workouts. I don't have a track to run on, so it's hard to keep looking down at the phone to check if I've gone the 200 or 800 or whatever metered distance while trying to keep the workout pace. I definitely like the variety of runs in the library. Keep adding more!

Great app for beginners. However, super glitchy and not at all accurate. Final straw for me was a "guided run" with no guide and then having to uninstall the app to get it to stop time. Then I reinstalled and sure enough, it didn't log my run. Feeling a bit demotivated having just lost a recorded time. Not how an app should make you feel.

I have used this app for years and have become increasingly frustrated with it. The activity page hardly ever loads, so I am usually unable to see my logged mileage. It frequently signs me out and sometimes fails to allow me to sign back in. I used to be able to view and export my runs through a website, this was removed a while back with no explanation. If I didn't have years of running history logged on this app that I am unable to export, I would be switching to Strava.

This app is not it. It constantly asks me to login, freezes up often. I love the guided runs (although sometimes the yapping is a bit too much), but not all of them have the same qualities, and I constantly have to download them every time I run. The final straw is the fact that it doesn't even track properly in recent months. It messes up your pace and your distance.

The best running app! It's free and it can level up your game from distance running to sprinting. NIKE YOU NEED MORE GUIDED RUNS LIKE SPICY SPEED 3!! It's amazing what that run can do for you especially as some one who competes in middle distance and sprinting events. It's perfect for getting better and faster. A few notes/suggestions are that there should be a way to look up a workout especially with such a wide selection. I've recently been having problems with not being able to end my runs.

I have used the Nike Run app in various forms for over 15 years without many issues. This version is garbage. I have a brand new watch, and the app has basically frozen in the middle of my run three times. After closing the app mid run, it suddenly starts talking to me again later with no way to control it. I had to uninstall the app to get it to stop.

This app could be great however training plans runs can't be used in your watch. The most frustrating thing though is on guided runs the app can get stuck on a interval and freeze. The trainer will talk you through the whole run but the app will stay on one interval and you can stop or end the run. have had it happen multiple times on two phones. I had to reboot my phone to get it to stop. I lost all my time and progress for the runs.

Guided runs are have become so buggy.There's nothing quite as frustrating as running 7 minutes into a 12-minute tempo rep just for the app to come in and say "1 minute down, 11 to go!" This is going on for months with no fix. At this point, it's the app that goes. UPDATE gave it another shot for a week and I'm just wondering: who does the coding for this app? When I hit stop, it should stop. I shouldn't have to force-quit the app just to get a run to finish.

I have been using Nike Run Club for years and it is my most favorite running app. Its easy to use, accurately tracks, and customizable so I can be notified how I am doing on my run. I also love the colors change with the miles you run (im in green almost to blue) The only thing I wish it had was the ability to write data to my phones health app. Or maybe that is a down side to the health app I am using. either way, it is still my favorite.

I started half marathon training and this app has been life changing when it comes to my runs. I had such a hard time planning rest days and how/when to do intervals and ended up just running unnecessary amounts of useless miles because I didn't know what I was doing. This walks you through all of it for free. It keeps track of you mileage on your shoes, guides you through runs, and is super motivating. Highly recommend for the beginner/intermediate runner.

The app keeps freezing. It will start calculating, and when I go back to end, it's still on 0.00 miles. I have spoken to customer service to no avail, and I even sent them multiple screenshot, and they were no help. I asked if they could add the miles lost, and they could not even do that. I have to keep reinstalling the app for it to work correctly for a few days and then stop again.

The app definitely has a lot of positives for being free. Overall enjoy and recommend. However, I did a guided 30 minute interval, and it refused to let me stop the run after I finished. Only way to leave was to discard the run. It also should calculate the actual intervals, it was taking my pace during the rest times as the 1:30 and :45 timers all just ran consecutively.

I have loved this app since I started using it, but in the last few weeks, it's stopped recording my mileage or only recording a tiny portion of it so it's messing up my tracking. I've enjoyed listening to some of the guided runs, like using the simple timed portion, but I find it extremely frustrating to get finished with a run only to find nothing recorded. I've checked all the settings, made sure it's updated, etc. Nike is a huge company. This shouldn't be a hard fix.

I like it. I do wish the posts of runs had filters or sorting capabilities. Selecting "All Runs" just gives a list of over 300 that are on the list haphazardly. For instance, the half-marathon training shows up with something like, "12 weeks to go" then "7 weeks to go" than "3 weeks to go" but you de to scroll easy down to find "1 week to go". The ability to sort/filter would make this app much more user friendly.

Overall really good app, with just a few minor nuisances. I've used the 10K and 1/2 marathon training plans with solid success. They have a nice variety of workouts, to keep training from getting stale. Primary gripe is that about once a month, a workout log gets wiped out/doesn't record. Minor gripe is that I find the audio coaching on the guided runs to be too chatty for my tastes. I'd prefer an option with just the start & stop times for intervals, without the "rah-rah" stuff.

It's absolutely horrible, and I'm tired of giving it more chances to have my correct info. It's hard to believe this app has me at an almost 24 min mile while I'm on the treadmill with the indoors setting on and at a pace of 10:54. I installed this app to be a part of a challenge group to help me get ready for the marathon, and this has demotivated me so much, and I'm tired of it. Now, I won't have a group to work with, but it's not worth keeping this app.

Something is seriously wrong with this app, for being such a big name company someone dropped the ball on this app. It's literally made to track runs and is really struggling to do its one job. It's so frustrating to follow a program only for runs not to be recorded or for the app to keep crashing. It keeps logging me out, too, and now when I try to log back in it sends me on a loop back to the log in. Get it together Nike, FIX YOUR APP!

The guided workouts and runs are a great feature! My only complaint is that sometimes, especially when doing guided runs, the app doesn't let you end your run. It just loads forever while the time keeps ticking, even though it should be paused. A little annoying, but that's the only issue I've come across. Otherwise a great running app!

While I appreciate that this app has free training programs, it is virtually unusable if you want to track your run. The GPS on my phone is significantly off and has overstated multiple runs by over half mile for a 4 mile run. I have check battery usage, background info, etc and it is way off. Side by side with my smartwatch, I know it's not buildings or a view of the sky. This app just processes GPS data wrong and it makes using it as a tracker useless. Tested on both S24ultra and pixel9pro

This app constantly doesn't track the correct mileage, simply closes for no reason at all, or freezes and won't calculate your final mileage and forces you to discard the run completely. On long distance runs or challenges this is extremely frustrating because not only does it look like you didn't run at all it makes it extremely hard to calculate where you need to work on. You can't see your correct mileage times to find out your inconsistencies.

Now I use Strava instead, because this app constantly logs me out. And then every time I log back in, I have to re-enter my height and weight. or reset settings. I just want to be able to hit run, and go! UPDATE 2025 still an issue. The app just logs you out and requires an annoying log in process and 2 factor authentication... Just to track my run lol. update: new updates app, still have to log in every time and half the time I have to close the app and restart. Strava all the way!

I've been using this app since 2018 and it hasn't let me down. even with no service while on deployments it's able to track me and when I got back to the barracks with wifi it updated and the route was very accurate. I recommend you get this and have some friends tag along for some motivation 10/10. NOTE: if you like to take breaks durinf runs, set the auto stop function to off in the settings menu.

Its a great app for being free. Ive used NRC since 2012 & theyve fixed lots of issues over the years. Some things added, some removed, but it has most of the stats anyone would look for (I cant seem to find split times, only pacing). Its also cool that it provides coaching for all levels of exp, but i wish there was a way to limit the "encouragement" audio clips during the guided runs. I like it at the end of my run, but it rarely matches my music vibe. Otherwise great fun app. I recommend.

Coach Bennett is the best üòä always hated running, but really love his guided runs and now I just don't like running üòÑ EDIT Jun2025: However, lately the app has a real problem with tracking my route (like 300 m missing etc.) and messing up the pace because of it. GPS on my phone cannot be the problem, because I also have another app for wearable and the route is always there correctly. Hope someone fixes it, it makes comparing runs impossible.

Great app, but just one thing can make it perfect for me. I have a samsung phone, and was excited to see that NRC app now syncs with Health Connect. However, NRC doesn't send calories burned to Health Connect. Therefore, Health Connect doesn't record that activity in the Cronometer app that I use to track food intake. I can enter it manually, but defeats the whole purpose of connecting the apps. If that can be fixed, then I will change my rating to 5 stars.

Everything is exceptional on this app...guided runs, training plans, and the run tracking itself with GPS location. However, literally the only thing that bugs me is that the music feature is not working, at least for me. It will not pair to Spotify. I tried trouble shooting, nothing worked. PLEASE FIX and it will be a 5 star Rating!

Meh. I'd think Nike would have done a better job with this. It crashes during my runs. I lost 2 km of tracking today when it apparently decided to freeze up. Not the first time. Very often it doesn't show an accurate route and I live in a suburb with great reception and no tall buildings so it shouldn't have any problems. Can login using Facebook but can't connect to my friends. When I try it crashes the app. I think I'll try to find one with fewer bugs. Shame too . . . I liked the idea of tracking the mileage on my Reacts

Similar to many of the other reviews here, I've encountered more technical problems than I would like over my last 2 years of use. Running 5 times a week I have encountered about 4 out of every 10 runs to have a technical problem. Either I find the app closed out and didn't record anything from the run, or at the very end of the run, after clicking "finish run", it gets stuck on a loading screen forever. Otherwise the app is great. The guided runs are fantastic and trainng plans are solid.

Love the audio coaching as well as the run planning of "My Coach". I just wished they synced up better. when I select the MyCoach scheduled run I don't get the audio (I'm sure some prefer that). When I select the audio, the speed runs are for different sets. the first few audio coach runs had great background music, but the later ones don't seem to have that, and I'd love it if there was an option to bring it back. I don't have playlists on my phone. All in all love it, but want more.

Downloaded this app for the marathon training program. The guided runs are awesome. The coaching is very immersive & motivational. The only gripes I have at the moment would be that I wish there was more seamlessness between the phone & watch apps. It would be nice to start a run on my phone & have it waiting for me on my watch. Also, in order to do a distance based run on a treadmill, you have to hold your phone in your hand. "+1 mile" button or similar to track distance indoors would be nice.

Edit: 05/05/24 I have been using this app for a while now. It has some session related issues. It doesn't log me out automatically when. I dont use it for a couple days. If I assume it's logged in and use it, it doesn't let me stop my run and save progress. Even if I quit the app and restart, it's still stuck in the same place. And there is no way to access the full menu while it's stuck in the run. I have to clear data and uninstall and reinstall. Unfortunately by then, I have lost my progress

I used to rave about this app - but it has somehow lost all functionality and is completely useless. On every run, after the warmup/stretch, the app cannot properly track anything. The timer says you're resting when the audio says to be pushing on an interval and vice versa. So the interval lengths, paces, distances are wildly off. This app is so good in concept and got me through half marathon training last year. Nike, what happened?!?!

I love the guided runs on this app. Some of them feel really meditative. I used this to train for my first 5k and my first 10k. So many good runs! My biggest issue: I desperately wish there was a way to sort or filter guided runs. It is a bit frustrating to spend so long just scrolling to find a run to fit what I need. I would love to be able to sort by time or distance or themes. I also don't think the run tracking part is fantastic. I rely on my Garmin for doing that.

I've used the app since 2007, and it's always been great, but for the last year or so it's just buggy. I can't do intervals anymore because any run where you stop to stretch causes the app to glitch and not resume the run when you're ready. My apple friend's don't appear to have these issues. If Nike isn't going to support the product on this platform properly l, they out to just can it. But, I hope they just do the right thing and fix the bugs for us android runners.

Overall, I've had a good experience doing the training plans available on the app. It makes running a lot less unbearable with someone keeping you going. Distance tracking is pretty good and you can see how far your friends in your club go as well. Pretty cool to see yearly, monthly and weekly summaries. But I have had issues with app freezing and not tracking (rare) but it's quite frustrating when it happens.

I put it on a newer phone (the "old" phone isn't very old). So far it syncs great. 4 stars not 5, because I still don't trust it, also I'm bummed that I can't add the lost run and have it count (I have a screenshot of the time and distance, along with the neverending "syncing" circle). P.S. When I say sync, I'm referring to app syncing with the NRC site. I turn wifi back on when I get home. Turn it off before I leave to save battery. (No service on the phone). See my history for initial review.

If it's not the app not adjusting volume correctly, it stops the coaching sections with no warning. Logs you out all the time. Downloads will act up. So MANY THINGS WRONG. Trying to get support to help is a nightmare and pretty much no help. The app is great, when it works. It's just very inconsistent. The app is getting worse over time. I'll be dropping this app after a decade. Screw you Nike.

Overall, I really enjoy this app. The guided runs are great, motivational, and keep me moving. My two biggest complaints are how frequently it logs me out, then loses my saved and downloaded runs, and that even in indoor mode, doing a treadmill themed run, it won't store it as completed because it didn't log a distance.

Informative, practical, useful, easy to use. The guided runs are perfect for me. Downside is that training events seem to be completed only when GPS data is recorded. The app wont record any of my training events as completed when running on a treadmill, even if the training is time based. As a result, I have some training events not completed on my profile. Please add the ability to edit a training event and/or select treadmill running. 3 stars because of this

It doesn't record activity. It's failed to record two of my runs this week and has done so multiple times in the past. The app says it's been "Finishing [my] run" for two days. It frequently crashes and fails to perform it's most basic function. If there was an alternative I would use it, but there isn't, at least not one that isn't also broken.

Audio prompt measurements for distance have always been a little inaccurate but, within the past week, have become even more inaccurate. Just did a 4 mile run (I've driven the route in my car to measure) and NRC is saying I ran 4.65 miles. Thats a huge problem when training for marathons and hearing I've run 19 miles when I've actually only ran about 16. I've been using NRC since 2021 and it's never been this off. It's at the point where I can't really use it anymore it's so inaccurate.

This app is horrible. I have had this app for years and have had nothing but issues with it the last 3-4. Most of the time it wont load or open all the way past clicking the "log in" option. I have to consgantly uninstall the app. Only reason i keep using it is because it has my history for the past 10 years on it. Everytime i start running, i open the app and i have to log in all over again, confirm my account... a mess.

Please package this application with options for galaxy watch 6. I don't want to run with a 1lb phone in my pocket, that's why I bought a smartwatch. We would all love to have our run training program(s), for 5-20k,-marathon etc, with the basics of the programs on the WATCH! we have processors, memory, storage, GPS, everything we need to run with just the watch ! Your application just doesn't function with programs there. What's the point? Make it function on watches the same, please!

I still love the many challenges. The accuracy is good. I like how much it can be personalized. I like the encouragement, but I'm going to delete it because every time I open it (especially if it has been a few days), it wants me to sign in again. That's bad enough, but then it emails me a code to verify it's me. I PROMISE no one is going to hack my account and add or delete runs. I don't buy through the app. If people do, you could always have it redirect to the site, and log in there!

This has always happened on and off (past 5 years) ...Won't resume or track my run midway through. Won't stop and end it either so I can start a new one. Makes me so mad!!!!!!! I have to Uninstall it just to make it stop "tracking" my run which consists of only keeping time, not distance. Grrrrrrr. When it works its great...

I love Nike but this app blows. I have stuck with it for years now and I don't know why. it constantly freezes, stops tracking distance, but still counts time, won't let you end run, and therefore keeps very inaccurate statistics. All the things that are important to a runner. I'm out. Officially used for last time. Hello Strava...

I have used this app for at least 3 years but only began really loving this app in the last few months when I discovered Coach Bennett and his guided runs. But for the last 3 months , after another "whatever" inane, infinite update, it no longer opens. I have gone through all steps to "fix" and it still won't open. I just want to get a crash report so I can send it to Nike as I think it may be a conflict between the app and my specific phone. Puma works perfectly though ‚òπÔ∏è

The app would be great but it's designed to be always-connected. Get to the trailhead where there's no signal? You may be SOL because it is demanding you log in to their server before you can do anything in the app! Come on guys, this is an obvious use case. Why is the app asking me to log in all the time anyway? Also, yesterday saved a long run, heard the message "Workout complete, time..." Later I looked and the run was gone. What? I went to manually add the run, and there it was, incomplete

I use this every time I run. Run with location on so the mileage will be more accurate. I like that it tracks my pace as well as altitude of my run. It gives me my average pace and total run time every mile. It pauses when I stop (rather, when my dog stops) so the stops don't affect my pace as much. Sometimes, when I finish a workout, a recording from a celebrity plays to encourage you to keep up the run! :)

There's greatness marred by glitchy software. I've gone on several guided runs and it's only saved about half of them. Very frustrating not seeing my actual total mileage or progress being tracked. You'll have better luck using a physical log to avoid disappointment. I enjoy the coaches and their energy but it's hard to continue when I the app doesn't want to save my progress. It makes makes me feel like I'm cutting corners when I don't see a checkmark next to my planned runs. Make me like it!

title: Wish: Shop and Save
description:
Wish is home to deals on millions of items from around the world. The destination for home and life - discover everything from everyday basics, hobbies & DIY, fashion for all, the latest in tech, to the wonderfully unexpected - and everything in-between, at prices likely to make you smile! The Wish app is the internet‚Äôs best-kept secret for affordable online shopping.

DESTINATION FOR HOME AND LIFE üè†ü™¥
Fuel your free time with a little bit of everything from electronics, fashion, automotive gear, wellness, home essentials, unique decor, the intentionally surprising, and much, much more.

DISCOVERY IS EASY üëç
Scroll the infinite product feed that features items chosen just for you.
Explore by category to find just what you‚Äôre looking for.
Find authentic products from your favorite brands.

SAVE ON SHIPPING üööüì¶
Spend less to ship the deals you‚Äôll discover with flat rate shipping.
Get $2.99 flat rate shipping when you spend $10 on eligible items.
Save even more by snagging extra shipping promos and discounts.
Available only in select countries.

SHOP AND SAVE üíµ
Shop daily deals and flash sales.
Earn a daily login stamp for every day you open the Wish app. 7 visits gets you up to 50% off!
Use your rewards points to save even more on your favorite items.

WE‚ÄôVE GOT YOUR BACK ü§ù
Every order is backed by our Wish Buyer Protection promise.
Get notifications about your order status every step of the way.
Check out securely with credit/debit card, PayPal, Klarna, and more.
Need help with your order? Wish Assistant is at your service 24/7.

SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE üì±üõçü•ã
We‚Äôve got whatever you‚Äôre into: clothing, electronics, gardening tools, sports equipment, anime figurines, bags, decor, makeup, toys, drones, smartwatches, or designer perfume.
Find one-of-a-kind gifts for every occasion without going over budget.

STAY IN TOUCH
Instagram: @wish
Facebook: @wish
Customer support: www.wish.com/help

The destination for home and life - discover everything from everyday basics, hobbies & DIY, fashion for all, the latest in tech, to the wonderfully unexpected - and everything in-between, at prices likely to make you smile! The Wish app is the internet‚Äôs best-kept secret for affordable online shopping.

DESTINATION FOR HOME AND LIFE üè†ü™¥
Fuel your free time with a little bit of everything from electronics, fashion, automotive gear, wellness, home essentials, unique decor, the intentionally surprising, and much, much more.

DISCOVERY IS EASY üëç
Scroll the infinite product feed that features items chosen just for you.
Explore by category to find just what you‚Äôre looking for.
Find authentic products from your favorite brands.

SAVE ON SHIPPING üööüì¶

Get $2.99 flat rate shipping when you spend $10 on eligible items.
Save even more by snagging extra shipping promos and discounts.
Available only in select countries.

summary: Home & Life, Fashion, Electronics

scraped_reviews.content: iv used wish since 2019. there have been some problems over the years, but they were usually resolved, and the good prices and clothes i like kept me using it. but for about the last year or so it has gone straight to hell. at least half the stuff is now more expensive than Amazon, and many things iv ordered just keep being suddenly refunded with no explanation. my last order of 7 things has only 1 item actually shipped, 5 refunded, 1 that might or might not ship. time to give up and move on!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sir! We're sad to know that your experience was not satisfactory. If you experience any dissatisfaction, please contact our customer care at reviews@wish.com.

scraped_reviews.content: wish has become entirely useless. Even something like an Xbox 360 controller ($20 back in the day) costs $50. Useless app that's not even good for the only thing it used to be food for. Cheap low-quality items. instead, now they're expensive low-quality items. (They will surely respond that items have gone up in quality. I can assure you from personal experience they have not.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always looking to improve your experience. Any specific incident we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to reviews@wish.com.

scraped_reviews.content: There are plenty of great items to enjoy shopping for as well as good as it gets on prices, though the delivery process takes a bit longer then expected. definitely not mad about that. Ether* I totally get it, happy I got it & it's all good now. Shipping products probably takes a while do to distance or amount of items being sold. That's my honest opinion on my WISH LIST! From Wish*
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey, thanks for writing a review. Sometimes, the app may be slow but such instances are rare. If it happens too often, please let us know at reviews@wish.com. We'll have things investigated.

scraped_reviews.content: They have just about everything under the sun! good prices and good quality most of the time!? the return policy is pretty good and they seem to take over when the company doesn't do it, and you still get your return! deservedly! the shipments seem to take a long time, but that's probably due to be US/China trade difficulties!?! I'm having a blast starting a new hobby! I got to say, Wish has more than the ability to fulfill those hobbies! I know huh?!? go ahead and hop on!?!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing your valuable feedback. Please reach out to us at reviews@wish.com, if you have other suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: Ordered several items, but its been over a month and a few items are marked still processing. The other items that have shipped started with a two week delivery date, then went to a month, and checked today and its still going to be another month before receiving them???? I don't mind waiting on things, but starting to wander if I wasted my money here, and if I will ever receive the items I paid for, since customer service is a robot, definitely not ordering anything else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that you haven't received your item. Please share the details of your issue at reviews@wish.com so that we can look into it & assist you in the best possible way.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is absolutely horrendous! I placed my order, it said it all items would arrive within a week, I would have had plenty of time to receive and wrap for Christmas, and now it says my items will not arrive until January 17th! That's more than three weeks after Christmas! It's ridiculous! Additionally they do not honor the promotion codes for a new order and customer. I have reached out to customer service and the only thing I ever get our automated prefilled computer-generated emails with no one paying attention to what happened! I will never use this app again. Don't fall for the gimmick sales! This thing is atrocious.!

Great selection of products for less. Shipping costs are on the high side, much higher than the product you are buying most of the time. I have a membership, so some items are shipped for free. I think having to pay $5.99 a month for membership should get you free shipping on EVERYTHING but it doesn't. Items arrive quicker than they used to, which is always a plus. If you don't get the exact product you order, color, design etc, you get a refund on it which I love. It has only happened 1 time.

It is perfectly fine. Not that anyone is gonna read this. No one reads 2 star reviews...lol. Wish will refund your money when you don't get your product, or if the description, and what you get is completely wrong. Just email them. Seriously, just let them know. The waiting "up to" 3 months for an item is ridiculous! advertising says 1, but most the time, it takes 1-3 months, so if it is a gift, plan ahead!

DO NOT BUY FROM THEM! My item's arrival date was initially "between June 16 - July 6", then it was "by July 21", and now it's "by Sept 14"! Does anyone want to buy something that takes at least 3 months to arrive? They trick you with shorter arrival time first, then keep on changing it every two weeks. And you only talk to a bot when you try to contact them in the app. This site used to be good, but now it's the worst!! Spend an extra $ or 2, buy it from other sites, and get the item in a week!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that you haven't received your item and the delivery date extended. Please let us know your order number at reviews@wish.com so that we can look into it & assist you in the best possible way.

scraped_reviews.content: I had wish for over 2 yrs. Bought several items from it. Rarely had an issue, if I did, was made it right by a refund. But lately prices are different from what's advertised. They added new limited quantity items you can win really cheap! NEVER won any. Most items came as expected, just read reviews before purchasing and It does take a while to receive from China. Last week Unauthorized Purchases were made over $150 . Cancelled card/deactivated account. Take caution. No more wish for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the confusion. Limited quantity deals mean that the FIRST person to order and have their order processed that DAY will get the item/s for $1 + $1 shipping. If you're unhappy , you can cancel it within 8 hours of purchase. We appreciate your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: The shipping is too high. When you order the same item it charges shipping for each piece instead of a flat rate. It will all be in the same box. For example, instead of paying $22 for each item with shipping it ends up $27.50 for each item before tax. I could have ordered the item from Amazon and gotten it quicker if I wanted to pay a higher price. Pay attention to the reviews, some of the comments are not about the items pictured. Also, pay attention to reviews with pictures for more accuracy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hope to offer competitive prices on all our items! Shipping costs can vary depending on the store, your location, and the type of shipping you select. Shipping costs will be displayed once you add an item to your cart.

scraped_reviews.content: If I could give this a minus zero I would! I tried placing an order, but when it got to the actual order placing, it kept popping up, oops problem with payment, try a different method of payment, or something to that effect! There should not have been any problem with the credit card I was using! My cc company actually contacted me while I was trying to check out, asking if I had made this purchase! Never could get it to go through, over a hundred dollars worth of merchandise! Bye
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We recommend uninstalling and reinstalling the app. This should help with any issues you have experienced. We hope this help.

scraped_reviews.content: I ordered a few items and wanted to wait till they arrived before i rated the app. my items arrived a few days early (they take a month to get as it comes from china). The best description of wish is that it's like etsy. different sellers means some items will be great while others may be just ok. Make sure to read the reviews before buying and you'll be fine. My items were atcually really nice and I'm happy with my purchases. hope this helps!!

It seemed too good to be true. I ordered a boatload of stuff. It WAS too good to be true. Of the many items I ordered, I recieved ONE. The customer service was horrible, if nonexistent. I contacted the company. Wrote several emails with all the order numbers. Kept getting the same, clearly electronic response, telling me to do just that. The website continues to say "arriving soon", months later. I want the items or my money back, or at least a human response! SHAME ON YOU!

If you want to be charged hundreds of dollars for things you DID NOT order, then be told upon complaining that someone will probably contact you in a week or two, then this is the app for you! For bonus points, if you actually place an order, expect to wait a couple months before you get anything. But if you get hacked and somebody orders a dozen things, it will miraculously be "already shipped, too late to cancel" when you catch it the next morning.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We takes account security very seriously. Wish will never expose your personal information to anyone. Protecting your privacy is our top priority and we're constantly working to make sure that shopping with Wish is always safe and fun.

scraped_reviews.content: They have become unreliable. I was not permitted to cancel an order after a 30 day "no show". Their automated system would suggest to "give it more time" due to COVID. They would update the expected arrival time to be ANOTHER 30 days. This kept happening for months. Until finally, on September 30, 2020, they gave me the notice that "OOPS! This order has expired and you may no longer request a refund". They have also apparently managed to delete my previous review which rates them poorly. Adios

I have ordered several items that were advertised as sterling silver however, the items were fake. The shipping cost is 5 times my total cost. I wonder if it is because the items are shipped from China. Some items I never received yet no refund was issued. The advertised price is 5 to 10 times lower than the actual price üò≥ wondering why that is. The items that are listed as free has a shipping cost that more than makes up for it being free.

My first experience was pretty good. My things came quick and it was exactly what I ordered. I understand with what's going on that shipping would be a slight delay. But 3 months! I ordered 4 mask for my family. The shipment date was May. I did not receive them until August. It took so long I just went out and bought 4 at the store. Each month the date would change. They have a lot of nice things. But the shipping is terrible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please share the details of your issue at reviews@wish.com so that we can look into it & assist you in the best possible way.

scraped_reviews.content: Nice discount app, with what seems to be quality products... UPDATE: Shipping costs have become ridiculous now!!!! You're basically paying the same price in shipping as you do for the product. If an item is $20 expect to pay close to $20 in shipping, for each item, regardless if they ship them together. What was a nice app of knock-offs at discount prices is becoming an app with knock-offs at name brand pricesüòï As if supporting China wasn't already hard enough

I tried purchasing an item that was on sale for $2. It said order processing. Ok, I thought, good to go, right? Wrong, that was a week ago. I just got a notification that my payment method was declined, I opened the app and saw that it was charging my almost $15 total for the item. The only reason Wish didn't get away with stealing from me was because they took A WHOLE WEEK to process my order and by that time I didn't have enough money in my account for the new increased price.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Wish does not set prices directly, but some stores set their own prices for each item, so it's possible for different stores to sell the same product variation at different prices. If you need more help, please feel free to email us at reviews@wish.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Couldnt get into my account. I ordered a ton of items. Customer service needs to improve. Everything was going well in the beginning. I am deeply saddened and disappointed. I just responded and sent a email but it wants you to respond on the app I cant get into as I explained. Why wouldnt they just respond through the email? (Update) No one has fixed the problem, I even gave them the hackers email. Never gave permission for a email change. Don't use this app super dangerous. To easy to be hacked
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wish takes account security very seriously. To confirm your identity, please follow the steps in the app through our secure server. The appropriate team will be in touch.

scraped_reviews.content: Sometimes it's all good !! But sometimes items arrive different than advertised , bummer !! And sometimes items don't even arrive !!! But the people at wish can not control the sellers . So if you contact them , they will work with you to resolve the issue !!! And if they can not get the seller to comply , they will refund your payment , to the best of your satisfaction , if they can . So I guess what I'm trying to say is this , it's a pretty good selling app ! Thank you Wish incorporated .
scraped_reviews.replyContent: At Wish, we aim for 100% satisfaction. If you received something that doesn't match the item listing, please email reviews@wish.com with your Apple review username so that we can help you resolve this.

scraped_reviews.content: Items I ordered never came, customer service is ridiculous, everything u see on this app can be purchased through ebay, I highly recommend going there instead as I always get what I order from them & most things are cheaper on ebay. Wish wants u to think ur getting a good deal so they offer items for "free" but charge a crazy amount for shipping, as the consumer,  I'd much rather pay $2 for an item with free shipping on ebay verses buying  the same item for "free" on wish & pay $5 for shipping.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're really sorry to hear about your experience, and we hope that we can provide a better one moving forward. Please email us at reviews@wish.com so that we can continue improving.

scraped_reviews.content: Love how you can save stuff on your list to buy later. I hate how much shipping is. Also, you can't use multiple coupons which makes it not worth the deals because the shipping is so high. When you do get a good price with shipping and the item it is 100% worth it. I only buy stuff with reviews. I also love that they give you extra points for doing a review! I wish we could choose an alternate form of payment every time you buy something. It would be nice to use a different account or card.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wish depends on feedback from customers like you. We appreciate the thoughts you have shared with us.

scraped_reviews.content: I like everything about it, except one thing! I do not like that it shows items at very low to free prices plus shipping and handling, but, then it's actually a contest, you have to be the first one to have payment fully processed. Considering it's in all countries, by the time I'm able to get on and order, there are like thousands of ppl who have already submitted! Other than that, it's great, just don't order things if you need them quickly cuz you will have to wait a few weeks!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, Sandra! üôÇ

scraped_reviews.content: Wish is a great platform for getting cheated and scammed. Order (and pay for) multiples of an item and only get one. Order something and get an entirely different, inferior item. Receive items that don't match the description, or are of ludicrously poor quality. Out of ten transactions I've made on Wish, seven have been bad experiences. On the app, the search function sucks, it's difficult and nonintuitive to remove items from your cart, and shipping costs are inflated. BUYER BEWARE.

Wish NEEDS to fix the payment process section. This is the 2nd time I've ordered (a year apart on different phones) from wish and the slide to pay just glitches and it just goes ahead and processes the order within seconds and without you confirming anything or using the slide to pay button or even giving you the time to check your cart/items. I don't understand why this happens but it's completely ridiculous at this point. The next I order make (if) I will be sure to record it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us and I'm sorry to hear about your experience with Wish. I'll be sure to pass your feedback to the appropriate team. Don't hesitate to let us know if there's anything we can do to help

scraped_reviews.content: Great at first. But order after order being short and basically telling me I don't know how to read or count. Because I know what I read and I didn't get my order correct. Had orders for 2 or 3 and would only get 1. 1 time I got 2 on an order for 3. Either way you wait a long time for the wrong order or amount to come. How ever many people spent every week and every month but don't anymore add 1 more to that. Cause I'm through getting told how I'm wrong. When you are wrong in more ways than one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us today, and we apologize for your experience. We appreciate your feedback. Have a good day!

scraped_reviews.content: I seen some items and joined. I don't think you should have to join. When you agree, you give more of your rights away. Any way I got a discount code and put a few items in my basket. I could not enter code anywhere so I hit purchase or whatever the button is called and thought I would enter code at review basket stage. It just took off and that was it. No review, no discount. I had to cancel items 1 at a time. I found them cheaper elsewhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wish depends on feedback from customers like you. We appreciate the thoughts you have shared with us.

scraped_reviews.content: I have ordered and waited for a long time just to have the item not arrive! When that happens, I can usually get a credit quickly. However, I bought gifts on here 10/2/2019 for Christmas and they've not arrived! This needs to addressed and corrected. Also, the prices are increasing on women's purses and many other items. They are attempting to increase their profits by charging the U.S. retail value.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear you haven't received your order yet. Please email us at reviews@wish.com and provide your  review username so we can resolve your issue right away.

scraped_reviews.content: Their prices, shipping time, and shipping prices have all gone up. There is nothing backing their reason to do so but greed. With other apps that do the same thing they do but better. *edit to reply to wish* so if i buy 5 of the exact same thing that is $2 but just in different color there is still a $3 shipping fee per item. You have to know that sites like aliexpress ususlly dont charge shipping and figures out how to ship their stuff in a timely manner. Know better do better like they have.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We strive to maintain low shipping costs on Wish. The cost varies depending on the size, weight, and destination of your order. Please feel free to contact us at reviews@wish.com if you need more help!

scraped_reviews.content: Love the large selection! I just made my purchases so I have to wait and see how long it takes for all of them to arrive. I've heard both good and bad things about buying from Wish, but I figure it's a deal shoot...Sometimes you can get everything you asked for or you can get exactly what you paid for. If you'd paid retail then I would completely understand complaining about it taking a month for your purchases to arrive, but if you're paying pennies compared to dollars then patience is key.

I have received a few items of my first order. I was sent EU plugs and they were sent back. I kept the wires. Green works great. Pink is slow charging. I paid separate shipping for these 2 plugs and cords, yet they came in the same bag. The coloring book I received is much smaller than the picture looked. Most of the pictures have too much space. The ratio of space to detail of picture is about 50\50. Other than that some pricing is not bad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We hope that we give a better service in your future order. Happy shopping!

scraped_reviews.content: Avoided many things off of wish and I've enjoyed every single one of them except for maybe one or two that will kind of flimsy but for the most part you definitely get more than what you paid for. There's a lot of really good things you can get on wish but some prices State one and only click on to a different size or color the price is way different that's one thing I don't like about it

For the most part it's a good site to find inexpensive products. You can usually get a 5 to 10% discount every time you place an order and you earn points towards discounts when you review products. However, be sure to read reviews, never buy anything that doesn't have any reviews or pictures of the products received. Also, shipping can take months sometimes since coming from overseas, so don't buy anything you need ASAP.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for writing a review, Vanessa. If you experience any dissatisfaction, please contact our customer care at reviews@wish.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Total rip off!!!! You place an order, get an expected delivery date, but your items don't arrive until a month after they were supposed to arrive if they even arrive at all. I had to have half of the items I purchased refunded because they never arrived and then I had to jump through hoops just to get my money back. And to top it all off shipping on each individual item is more than the item itself so you actually end up not saving anything. NEVER AGAIN!!!!!!!

I cant log in with anything other than Facebook ? I use Google, it tells me to log in to Facebook. I simply sign up, it says I need to log in to Facebook. It's also very glitchy- the "related" tab never loads & sometimes it just stays on a white screen. Oh well ! Most items aren't worth it when the shipping doubles or even triples the total in the end. Wish is one of those fun moments, where you drink and order silly to see if things even show up looking the same, and that's alright with me :')

I ended up comparing prices with Wish, Ebay and Amazon to see who had the better deals and the best product quality. And I have to say it most definitely isn't Wish, everything on wish is extremely cheap made. Which is horrible, because once you add the price of the product with the price of shipping you're paying regular price for the items if not more. And the so called deals for 50% off isn't really 50% off for existing customers, it's only 5% or less off. Go to Amazon or Ebay or Esty. üôÑüôÑüôÑ

Overall it's a good app. Some of the stores you can order from in the app aren't so great. I ordered a pair of shoes from one of them and they sent me three sizes too small. But, Wish gave me a refund and suggested not ordering from the same store. You can leave reviews on everything. Some things also come broken in the packages, but Wish does give a refund for it. You just have to be careful when ordering

Not worth it anymore. Shipping is usually 3-4 times more than the product and products are way more expensive now, might as well buy elsewhere. Now most deals are "limited" and I've never actually had one go through. While their CS is a tad better than it used to be, I still find it frustrating. The refund system has kinks in it, although I do like the automation of it. After I get my full refund I'll most likely be deleting this app. I'd rather pay for things I want and actually get them.

It's a bit addictive, like Christmas every few days (after the initial 2-3 week wait) once I started receiving orders and ordering more. My only gripe is that often the price is only for a particular size or color. Be aware that most clothing you will want to order 2 sizes larger that you would generally order (unless you're tiny) and be aware of shipping prices. Most of this is coming from China so it costs a bit for shipping and takes a while. Overall though, I'm pleased with the site. Watch out for some items that are great in the picture but slightly lesser quality when you receive. Go by buyers photos when you can.

Prices are great but shipping is too expensive. Without flat rate shipping, you might as well use Amazon. You get your packages quicker. It will cost you about the same. Added: Checking in on the app and lowered my rating because it really is ridiculous the way they charge shipping. If you buy two of the same item they will charge you shipping for both items as if they were purchased individually. I will never use this app again unless they bring back flat rate shipping.

It is a pretty awesome app to find dollar store stuff at dollar store prices. The stuff that makes me give this app 3 stars is the price for shipping. There needs to be a extension tab for being able to buy these products at these prices still but having discounted possibly grouped shipping option for bulk buys. I don't believe that these goods are high quality. There have been multiple times when the product has not been as described or was made poorly while other times I have lucked out.

Updated rating. I did as you told me and went back to my account, attempted to use the account support option. LOL! What a joke! It is a pre- recorded bot response that gives you no viable options to report your issue? They never let you talk to a real person. I have sent 100's of screenshots depicting the problem and they say contact support over and over. Every item I ordered when I check the delivery invoice it runs me around in circles.never too answer where is it? I paid for it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry about your experience with Wish. We currently provide all customer service through the Wish app. However, it's our goal to resolve all issues as quickly as possible. We would appreciate hearing more feedback about your situation. Please reach out to reviews@wish.com and we're more than happy to help. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: This app works great! A 5 star - Wish retailer's most of the time will not ship, so your stuck waiting for items that you'll never get, especially with good sale prices or their so called super sales that are hard to believe. The shoes that I did get were very low quality made out of super thin plastic, I have learned a lesson with Wish! You get what you pay for!!! But it takes a long time to get it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us today, and we apologize for your experience. We appreciate your feedback. Have a good day!

scraped_reviews.content: Some items are so cheaply made that they fall apart before you can use them. You have a 50/50 chance of your item even arriving. While you can get refunds for stuff you don't receive or items that break you apparently only get so many refunds before they refuse them. I received a bracelet that wasn't in the color I ordered recently and tried to get a refund and received an electronic message that the refund was refused. I will no longer use this app. Ebay is much better overall. Their suppliers are much easier to deal with and it's better quality merchandise.

For the most part wish is a wonderful app. I never purchase clothes or shoes from wish, because the larger the size the more it costs, and you always have to purchase 2-3 sizes up. Also their is a chance that they used a cheaper material to make them. Shipping takes a while which isn't that bad . I do however love getting make up from them I've never had any problems. Another plus is that they automatically refund if you receive damaged items.

Love this app. I order something every week. Has everything I need. Tip... If you order a lot at once keep up with each products arrival date. If produt(s) have not arrive by that time, let customer service know. They will either refund your money or resend the product with in 30 days. After the 30 days there is nothing they can do and you will have lost your money
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're so happy to hear you're enjoying Wish!

scraped_reviews.content: can be buyer beware but that has not been my experience. I love shopping on Wish. can find reasonable prices, customer service is excellent, in my experience anyways. I can always find what I'm looking for and shipping times have gotten shorter & more reliable. Lil update on 4/19/2024. Their Customer service model is one of my favorites. Very hard to beat. Very happy with improvements in shipping and shipping times. Good job team!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We do our best and see the success of customer feedback like yours.üëç

scraped_reviews.content: I purchased 4 items had one of the items shipped to a store they suggested for pickup. I never received that one item. Customer support/help is basically told me it shipped and that was the end. I remained in contact with the store owner for 3 months looking for the item. Never received the item, nor a refund. I found the same item on Amazon and received it within 3 days. So, be careful.

title: DailyWire+
description:
What began as a news and conservative podcast company in 2015 has rapidly grown into the number one voice of counter-culture in America.

The DailyWire+ App is the streaming home of The Daily Wire, Ben Shapiro, Jordan Peterson, Matt Walsh, DailyWire+ Movies, and PragerU. We fight for what we believe in. We have fun doing it, and we make it entertaining. Download DailyWire+ to access top news, commentary, investigative journalism, podcasts, movies, documentaries, original series, and more.

The Daily Wire contributors ‚Äî Ben Shapiro, Dr. Jordan B. Peterson, Matt Walsh, Michael Knowles, Andrew Klavan, Jeremy Boreing and Reagan Conrad. Dropping Truth Bombs daily. summary: Noisy. Opinionated. Right.

scraped_reviews.content: A _lot_ of work has been done on the app recently and it has dramatically improved. Videos actually play correctly now without interfering with other audio sources, the status bar isn't hidden constantly anymore, it doesn't drain the battery after it's closed so far as I've noticed, etc. One problem that has actually reappeared, however, is that the share button on articles is now including the title in the text shared instead of just sharing the link. Very annoying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Yissakhar, thank you for the feedback.  We are sorry for the frustration with the share button. We are actively working to improve this to offer the best user experience possible. We are grateful for your support and are pleased that you are happy with our progress so far.

scraped_reviews.content: Can't fit everything but: Their cancellation is scummy. You can't cancel through the app, it brings you to the website, which looks different than the app and harder to find how to manage the subscription. At first, you can only see how to upgrade, in small texts, you see, "cancel". Once you click this, it's you're typical scumbag, "but wait, we have so much more to offer!" When you click past that it offers a discount, with no obvious way to decline it other than clicking an X you can't say no.

I would like to give it five stars. I love the Ben Shapiro show, the Matt Walsh show etc. and it's a great app . . . if you're just using it on your phone. The app for the TV however is garbage! It constantly glitches and freezes, (every other app on my TV works fine) there is no way to update the app on the TV, without uninstalling the app and then reinstalling and restarting it. Their customer service is an AI chatbot, so if you want to talk to a human being you're out of luck.

Our team is here to help if you‚Äôd like to discuss this further.

Recently, though, the app has started to crash randomly while listening to content. it crashed 3 times during my less than 1 hour drive, and naturally when it crashed it also forgot my progress

scraped_reviews.content: Good content, Petty Execution As much as I enjoy listening to DW (albeit, I don't agree with all of them) I'm having difficulty having a consistent, enjoyable experience with their software. For instance, I'll be listening to a podcast and it'll suddenly freeze. I'll sometimes have to reload the player or restart it to get it playing again. And this is rarely due to loss of Wi-Fi. Also, for some reason, the app will just shut down randomly for some reason. It's decent, but not 100% reliable.

The app is a good start, but it's missing some critical features. I listen at work, so I have to pause frequently when I'm talking to co-workers; the video plays when my screen is locked, but it doesn't respond to media controls - when I press pause on my earbuds, the video doesn't pause. Also, the video player doesn't have any controls for seeking forward or backward, and doesn't display a timestamp when manually scrolling the progress bar, so it makes finding your spot difficult. Additionally, it doesn't remember your spot when leaving the app. The audio player is more functional, in that you can browse through the rest of the app while listening, unlike video. Also, it has 30 second forward and backward buttons; it would be nice to be able to change the size, but I don't really care as long as it has them. It does respond to external media controls, so I can pause from my earbuds or car system. The big problem here is that the audio is the unedited podcast version - i.e. ads included, and no bonus content on the Sunday special. Essentially, it's the podcast version I can get for free anywhere without paying for a subscription. Another missing feature is the ability to download episodes; I'm on unlimited data, and frequently have access to Wi-Fi, so this isn't as big a deal for me, but it would be nice to have. As far as the news articles go, they work really well - clean layout, easy to read, no ads whatsoever. The only thing missing is the comment section; I don't typically comment, so not a huge deal, but I do enjoy reading them. If they had better controls for the video player or the edited ad-free audio version, it would be 5 stars, but as it currently stands, it's just mediocre.

This app is terrible, I have tried it 3 times over the last 3 years. I want to see the content, but the execution is so bad, it is unusable. Audio stops randomly and has to be turned back on. It won't pause when someone calls, it won't show up on Android Auto so my other music will play alongside it. You can't control the podcast from the ear buds. You can't resume when you left off or even see which content you have already seen. It doesn't autoplay the next podcast. COME ON GUYS!

We hope someday...

title: Kahoot! Play & Create Quizzes
description:
Play engaging quiz-based games (kahoots) at school, at home and at work, create your own kahoots and learn something new! Kahoot! brings the magic of learning for students, teachers, office superheroes, trivia fans and lifelong learners. 

Here‚Äôs what you can do with the Kahoot! app, now available in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Brazilian Portuguese and Norwegian:

Students
- Study with unlimited free flashcards and other smart study modes
- Join kahoots hosted live - in class or virtually - and use the app to submit answers
- Complete self-paced challenges
- Study at home or on the go with flashcards and other study modes
- Compete with friends in study leagues
- Challenge your friends with kahoots you found or created
- Create your own kahoots and add images or videos
- Host kahoots live for family and friends directly from your mobile device

Families and friends
- Find a kahoot on any topic, fit for any age
- Host a kahoot live by casting your screen to a big screen or screen share via video conferencing apps
- Engage your kids with studying at home
- Send a Kahoot! challenge to family members or friends
- Create your own kahoots and add different question types and image effects 

Teachers
- Search among millions of ready-to-play kahoots on any topic
- Create or edit your own kahoots in minutes
- Combine different question types to increase engagement 
- Host kahoots live in class or virtually for distance learning
- Assign student-paced challenges for content review
- Assess learning outcomes with reports

Company employees
- Create kahoots for e-learning, presentations, events and other occasions
- Encourage audience participation with polls and word cloud questions
- Host Kahoot! live in person or in a virtual meeting
- Assign self-paced challenges, for example, for e-learning 
- Assess progress and results with reports

Premium features:
Kahoot! is free for teachers and their students, and it‚Äôs our commitment to keep it that way as part of our mission to make learning awesome. We offer optional upgrades that unlock advanced features, such as an image library with millions of images and advanced question types, such as puzzles, polls, open-ended questions and slides. To take advantage of these features, users will need a paid subscription.
 
To create and host kahoots in a work context, as well as get access to additional features, business users will need a paid subscription.
